GE07mbh_07_u:0: 07,001.000*0001_01 nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam 07,001.000*0001_02 devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_07_u:2: 07,001.000*0002_02 yasyāsyakamalagalitaṃ vāṅmayam amṛtaṃ jagat pibati 07,001.000*0003_01 jitaṃ bhagavatā tena hariṇā lokadhāriṇā 07,001.000*0003_02 ajena viśvarūpeṇa nirguṇena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:5: 07,001.001 janamejaya uvāca 07,001.001a tam apratimasattvaujobalavīryaparākramam 07,001.001c hataṃ devavrataṃ śrutvā pāñcālyena śikhaṇḍinā 07,001.002a dhṛtarāṣṭras tadā rājā śokavyākulacetanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6: 07,001.002c kim aceṣṭata viprarṣe hate pitari vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:7: 07,001.003a tasya putro hi bhagavan bhīṣmadroṇamukhai rathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8: 07,001.003c parājitya maheṣvāsān pāṇḍavān rājyam icchati 07,001.004a tasmin hate tu bhagavan ketau sarvadhanuṣmatām
GE07mbh_07_u:9: 07,001.004c yad aceṣṭata kauravyas tan me brūhi dvijottama
GE07mbh_07_u:10: 07,001.005 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 07,001.005a nihataṃ pitaraṃ śrutvā dhṛtarāṣṭro janādhipaḥ 07,001.005c lebhe na śāntiṃ kauravyaś cintāśokaparāyaṇaḥ 07,001.006a tasya cintayato duḥkham aniśaṃ pārthivasya tat
GE07mbh_07_u:11: 07,001.006c ājagāma viśuddhātmā punar gāvalgaṇis tadā 07,001.006d*0005_01 niḥśvāsaparamo rājā dhyāyann āste hy adhomukhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:12: 07,001.006d*0005_02 astaṃ prāpte dinakare niśi gāvalgaṇis tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:14: 07,001.006d*0006_01 vyāsaprasādād vijñāya sarvaṃ vṛttāntam uttamam 07,001.006d*0006_02 sainikānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ senayor ubhayos tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:15: 07,001.007a śibirāt saṃjayaṃ prāptaṃ niśi nāgāhvayaṃ puram
GE07mbh_07_u:17: 07,001.008a śrutvā bhīṣmasya nidhanam aprahṛṣṭamanā bhṛśam 07,001.008c putrāṇāṃ jayam ākāṅkṣan vilalāpāturo yathā 07,001.008d*0007_01 dhārtarāṣṭrān mṛtān sarvān manye saṃjaya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:18: 07,001.009 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 07,001.009a saṃsādhya tu mahātmānaṃ bhīṣmaṃ bhīmaparākramam 07,001.009c kim akārṣuḥ paraṃ tāta kuravaḥ kālacoditāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:19: 07,001.009d*0008_01 hataṃ śrutvā mama sutaḥ kim akārṣīc ca saṃjaya 07,001.010a tasmin vinihate śūre durādharṣe mahaujasi 07,001.010c kiṃ nu svit kuravo 'kārṣur nimagnāḥ śokasāgare 07,001.010d*0009_01 saṃprāptāḥ kuravo yuddhe ke 'trātiṣṭhan paraṃtapāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:20: 07,001.011a tad udīrṇaṃ mahat sainyaṃ trailokyasyāpi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:21: 07,001.011b*0010_01 bhīṣmataḥ kauraveyāṇām abhiyāsyati kaḥ pumān 07,001.011c bhayam utpādayet tīvraṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām 07,001.011d*0011_01 ko hi dauryodhane sainye pumān āsīn mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22: 07,001.011d*0011_02 yaṃ prāpya sumahāyuddhe tan naḥ śaṃsa mahābhaye
GE07mbh_07_u:23: 07,001.012a devavrate tu nihate kurūṇām ṛṣabhe tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:24: 07,001.012c yad akārṣur nṛpatayas tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:25: 07,001.013 saṃjaya uvāca 07,001.013a śṛṇu rājann ekamanā vacanaṃ bruvato mama
GE07mbh_07_u:26: 07,001.013c yat te putrās tadākārṣur hate devavrate mṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:27: 07,001.014a nihate tu tadā bhīṣme rājan satyaparākrame
GE07mbh_07_u:28: 07,001.014c tāvakāḥ pāṇḍaveyāś ca prādhyāyanta pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_07_u:29: 07,001.015a vismitāś ca prahṛṣṭāś ca kṣatradharmaṃ niśāmya te
GE07mbh_07_u:30: 07,001.015b*0012_01 jugupsamānāḥ paramaṃ kṣātraṃ karma viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:31: 07,001.015c svadharmaṃ nindamānāś ca praṇipatya mahātmane 07,001.016a śayanaṃ kalpayām āsur bhīṣmāyāmitatejase
GE07mbh_07_u:33: 07,001.017a vidhāya rakṣāṃ bhīṣmāya samābhāṣya parasparam 07,001.017c anumānya ca gāṅgeyaṃ kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:35: 07,001.018c punar yuddhāya nirjagmuḥ kṣatriyāḥ kālacoditāḥ 07,001.019a tatas tūryaninādaiś ca bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:36: 07,001.019c tāvakānām anīkāni pareṣāṃ cāpi niryayuḥ 07,001.020a vyāvṛtte 'hani rājendra patite jāhnavīsute
GE07mbh_07_u:38: 07,001.021a anādṛtya vacaḥ pathyaṃ gāṅgeyasya mahātmanaḥ 07,001.021c niryayur bharataśreṣṭhāḥ śastrāṇy ādāya sarvaśaḥ 07,001.022a mohāt tava saputrasya vadhāc chāṃtanavasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:39: 07,001.022c kauravyā mṛtyusād bhūtāḥ sahitāḥ sarvarājabhiḥ 07,001.023a ajāvaya ivāgopā vane śvāpadasaṃkule
GE07mbh_07_u:40: 07,001.023b*0013_01 karṇa karṇeti cakranduḥ śeṣā bhārata pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:41: 07,001.023c bhṛśam udvignamanaso hīnā devavratena te 07,001.024a patite bharataśreṣṭhe babhūva kuruvāhinī
GE07mbh_07_u:42: 07,001.024c dyaur ivāpetanakṣatrā hīnaṃ kham iva vāyunā
GE07mbh_07_u:43: 07,001.025a vipannasasyeva mahī vāk caivāsaṃskṛtā yathā 07,001.025c āsurīva yathā senā nigṛhīte purā balau
GE07mbh_07_u:45: 07,001.026b*0014_01 lakṣmīr iva surais tyaktā śrutihīnā yathā dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:46: 07,001.026c vṛkair iva vane ruddhā pṛṣatī hatayūthapā
GE07mbh_07_u:49: 07,001.028a viṣvagvātahatā rugṇā naur ivāsīn mahārṇave 07,001.028c balibhiḥ pāṇḍavair vīrair labdhalakṣair bhṛśārditā 07,001.029a sā tadāsīd bhṛśaṃ senā vyākulāśvarathadvipā 07,001.029c viṣaṇṇabhūyiṣṭhanarā kṛpaṇā draṣṭum ābabhau
GE07mbh_07_u:50: 07,001.030a tasyāṃ trastā nṛpatayaḥ sainikāś ca pṛthagvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:51: 07,001.030c pātāla iva majjanto hīnā devavratena te
GE07mbh_07_u:52: 07,001.030e karṇaṃ hi kuravo 'smārṣuḥ sa hi devavratopamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:54: 07,001.031c bandhum āpadgatasyeva tam evopāgaman manaḥ 07,001.032a cukruśuḥ karṇa karṇeti tatra bhārata pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:55: 07,001.032c rādheyaṃ hitam asmākaṃ sūtaputraṃ tanutyajam 07,001.033a sa hi nāyudhyata tadā daśāhāni mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:56: 07,001.033c sāmātyabandhuḥ karṇo vai tam āhvayata māciram
GE07mbh_07_u:57: 07,001.034a bhīṣmeṇa hi mahābāhuḥ sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ 07,001.034c ratheṣu gaṇyamāneṣu
GE07mbh_07_u:60: 07,001.035c pitṛvittāmbudeveśān api yo yoddhum utsahet 07,001.036a sa tu tenaiva kopena rājan gāṅgeyam uktavān
GE07mbh_07_u:61: 07,001.036c tvayi jīvati kauravya nāhaṃ yotsye kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:62: 07,001.037a tvayā tu pāṇḍaveyeṣu nihateṣu mahāmṛdhe 07,001.037c duryodhanam anujñāpya vanaṃ yāsyāmi kaurava 07,001.038a pāṇḍavair vā hate bhīṣme tvayi svargam upeyuṣi
GE07mbh_07_u:63: 07,001.038c hantāsmy ekarathenaiva kṛtsnān yān manyase rathān
GE07mbh_07_u:64: 07,001.039a evam uktvā mahārāja daśāhāni mahāyaśāḥ 07,001.039c nāyudhyata tataḥ karṇaḥ putrasya tava saṃmate
GE07mbh_07_u:67: 07,001.041a tasmiṃs tu nihate śūre satyasaṃdhe mahaujasi
GE07mbh_07_u:68: 07,001.041c tvatsutāḥ karṇam asmārṣus tartukāmā iva plavam
GE07mbh_07_u:69: 07,001.042a tāvakās tava putrāś ca sahitāḥ sarvarājabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:70: 07,001.042c hā karṇa iti cākrandan kālo 'yam iti cābruvan 07,001.042d*0015_01 evaṃ te sma hi rādheyaṃ sūtaputraṃ tanutyajam
GE07mbh_07_u:71: 07,001.042d*0016_01 cukruśuḥ sahitā yodhās tatra tatra mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:73: 07,001.043c agaman no manaḥ karṇaṃ bandhum ātyayikeṣv iva
GE07mbh_07_u:74: 07,001.044a sa hi śakto raṇe rājaṃs trātum asmān mahābhayāt 07,001.044c tridaśān iva govindaḥ satataṃ sumahābhayāt 07,001.044d*0017_01 devān iva yathā viṣṇus trāyate mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:75: 07,001.045 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 07,001.045a tathā karṇaṃ yudhi varaṃ kīrtayantaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:78: 07,001.046a yat tad vaikartanaṃ karṇam agamad vo manas tadā 07,001.046c apy apaśyata rādheyaṃ sūtaputraṃ tanutyajam 07,001.047a api tan na mṛṣākārṣīd yudhi satyaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:79: 07,001.047c saṃbhrāntānāṃ tadārtānāṃ trastānāṃ trāṇam icchatām 07,001.048a api tat pūrayāṃ cakre dhanurdharavaro yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:80: 07,001.048c yat tad vinihate bhīṣme kauravāṇām apāvṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:81: 07,001.049a tat khaṇḍaṃ pūrayām āsa pareṣām ādadhad bhayam
GE07mbh_07_u:82: 07,001.049b*0019_01 sa hi vai puruṣavyāghro loke saṃjaya kathyate
GE07mbh_07_u:83: 07,001.049b*0019_02 ārtānāṃ bāndhavānāṃ ca krandatāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:84: 07,001.049b*0019_03 parityajya raṇe prāṇāṃs tattrāṇārthaṃ ca śarma ca
GE07mbh_07_u:85: 07,001.049c kṛtavān mama putrāṇāṃ jayāśāṃ saphalām api
GE07mbh_07_u:86: 07,002.001 saṃjaya uvāca 07,002.001a hataṃ bhīṣmam ādhirathir viditvā; bhinnāṃ nāvam ivātyagādhe
GE07mbh_07_u:88: 07,002.001c sodaryavad vyasanāt sūtaputraḥ; saṃtārayiṣyaṃs tava putrasya
GE07mbh_07_u:90: 07,002.002a śrutvā tu karṇaḥ puruṣendram acyutaṃ; nipātitaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_07_u:91: 07,002.002c athopāyāt tūrṇam amitrakarśano; dhanurdharāṇāṃ pravaras tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:93: 07,002.003a hate tu bhīṣme rathasattame parair; nimajjatīṃ nāvam ivārṇave
GE07mbh_07_u:95: 07,002.003c piteva putrāṃs tvarito 'bhyayāt tataḥ; saṃtārayiṣyaṃs tava putrasya senām 07,002.003d*0020_01 saṃmṛjya divyaṃ dhanur ātatajyaṃ
GE07mbh_07_u:99: 07,002.004 karṇa uvāca 07,002.004a yasmin dhṛtir buddhiparākramaujo; damaḥ satyaṃ vīraguṇāś ca sarve 07,002.004c astrāṇi divyāny atha saṃnatir hrīḥ; priyā ca vāg anapāyīni bhīṣme 07,002.005a brahmadviṣaghne satataṃ kṛtajñe; sanātanaṃ candramasīva lakṣma
GE07mbh_07_u:100: 07,002.005c sa cet praśāntaḥ paravīrahantā; manye hatān eva hi sarvayodhān 07,002.006a neha dhruvaṃ kiṃ cana jātu vidyate; asmiṃl loke karmaṇo
GE07mbh_07_u:102: 07,002.006c sūryodaye ko hi vimuktasaṃśayo; bhāvaṃ kurvītādya mahāvrate
GE07mbh_07_u:104: 07,002.007a vasuprabhāve vasuvīryasaṃbhave; gate vasūn eva vasuṃdharādhipe
GE07mbh_07_u:105: 07,002.007c vasūni putrāṃś ca vasuṃdharāṃ tathā; kurūṃś ca śocadhvam imāṃ ca vāhinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:106: 07,002.008 saṃjaya uvāca 07,002.008a mahāprabhāve varade nipātite; lokaśreṣṭhe śāṃtanave
GE07mbh_07_u:107: 07,002.008c parājiteṣu bharateṣu durmanāḥ; karṇo bhṛśaṃ nyaśvasad aśru vartayan 07,002.009a idaṃ tu rādheyavaco niśamya te; sutāś ca rājaṃs tava sainikāś ca ha 07,002.009c parasparaṃ cukruśur ārtijaṃ bhṛśaṃ; tadāśru netrair mumucur hi śabdavat 07,002.010a pravartamāne tu punar mahāhave; vigāhyamānāsu camūṣu pārthivaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:108: 07,002.010c athābravīd dharṣakaraṃ vacas tadā; ratharṣabhān sarvamahāratharṣabhaḥ 07,002.011 karṇa uvāca 07,002.011a jagaty anitye satataṃ pradhāvati; pracintayann asthiram adya
GE07mbh_07_u:110: 07,002.011c bhavatsu tiṣṭhatsv iha pātito raṇe; giriprakāśaḥ kurupuṃgavaḥ katham
GE07mbh_07_u:111: 07,002.012a nipātite śāṃtanave mahārathe; divākare bhūtalam āsthite yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:112: 07,002.012c na pārthivāḥ soḍhum alaṃ dhanaṃjayaṃ; giripravoḍhāram ivānilaṃ drumāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:113: 07,002.013a hatapradhānaṃ tv idam ārtarūpaṃ; parair hatotsāham anātham
GE07mbh_07_u:114: adya vai 07,002.013c mayā kurūṇāṃ paripālyam āhave; balaṃ yathā tena mahātmanā tathā 07,002.014a samāhitaṃ cātmani bhāram īdṛśaṃ; jagat tathānityam idaṃ ca lakṣaye 07,002.014c nipātitaṃ cāhavaśauṇḍam āhave; kathaṃ nu kuryām aham āhave bhayam
GE07mbh_07_u:115: 07,002.015a ahaṃ tu tān kuruvṛṣabhān ajihmagaiḥ; praverayan yamasadanaṃ raṇe caran 07,002.015c yaśaḥ paraṃ jagati vibhāvya vartitā; parair hato yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:117: 07,002.016a yudhiṣṭhiro dhṛtimatidharmatattvavān; vṛkodaro gajaśatatulyavikramaḥ 07,002.016c tathārjunas tridaśavarātmajo yato; na tad balaṃ sujayam athāmarair api
GE07mbh_07_u:118: 07,002.017a yamau raṇe yatra yamopamau bale; sasātyakir yatra ca
GE07mbh_07_u:120: 07,002.017c na tad balaṃ kāpuruṣo 'bhyupeyivān; nivartate mṛtyumukhād ivāsakṛt
GE07mbh_07_u:121: 07,002.018a tapo 'bhyudīrṇaṃ tapasaiva gamyate; balaṃ balenāpi tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:123: 07,002.018c manaś ca me śatrunivāraṇe dhruvaṃ; svarakṣaṇe cācalavad vyavasthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:126: 07,002.019a evaṃ caiṣāṃ budhyamānaḥ prabhāvaṃ; gatvaivāhaṃ tāñ jayāmy adya sūta 07,002.019c mitradroho marṣaṇīyo na me 'yaṃ; bhagne sainye yaḥ sahāyaḥ sa mitram
GE07mbh_07_u:127: 07,002.020a kartāsmy etat satpuruṣāryakarma; tyaktvā prāṇān anuyāsyāmi
GE07mbh_07_u:129: 07,002.020c sarvān saṃkhye śatrusaṃghān haniṣye; hatas tair vā vīralokaṃ gamiṣye 07,002.021a saṃprākruṣṭe ruditastrīkumāre; parābhūte pauruṣe dhārtarāṣṭre
GE07mbh_07_u:130: 07,002.021c mayā kṛtyam iti jānāmi sūta; tasmāc chatrūn dhārtarāṣṭrasya
GE07mbh_07_u:132: 07,002.022a kurūn rakṣan pāṇḍuputrāñ jighāṃsaṃs; tyaktvā prāṇān ghorarūpe
GE07mbh_07_u:134: 07,002.022c sarvān saṃkhye śatrusaṃghān nihatya; dāsyāmy ahaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāya rājyam 07,002.023a nibadhyatāṃ me kavacaṃ vicitraṃ; haimaṃ śubhraṃ maṇiratnāvabhāsi
GE07mbh_07_u:135: 07,002.023c śirastrāṇaṃ cārkasamānabhāsaṃ; dhanuḥ śarāṃś cāpi viṣāhikalpān
GE07mbh_07_u:136: 07,002.024a upāsaṅgān ṣoḍaśa yojayantu; dhanūṃṣi divyāni tathāharantu
GE07mbh_07_u:137: 07,002.024c asīṃś ca śaktīś ca gadāś ca gurvīḥ; śaṅkhaṃ ca jāmbūnadacitrabhāsam
GE07mbh_07_u:138: 07,002.025a etāṃ raukmīṃ nāgakakṣyāṃ ca jaitrīṃ; jaitraṃ ca me dhvajam indīvarābham 07,002.025c ślakṣṇair vastrair vipramṛjyānayasva; citrāṃ mālāṃ cātra
GE07mbh_07_u:139: baddhvā sajālām 07,002.026a aśvān agryān pāṇḍurābhraprakāśān; puṣṭān snātān mantrapūtābhir
GE07mbh_07_u:141: 07,002.026c taptair bhāṇḍaiḥ kāñcanair abhyupetāñ; śīghrāñ śīghraṃ sūtaputrānayasva
GE07mbh_07_u:142: 07,002.027a rathaṃ cāgryaṃ hemajālāvanaddhaṃ; ratnaiś citraṃ candrasūryaprakāśaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:143: 07,002.027c dravyair yuktaṃ saṃprahāropapannair; vāhair yuktaṃ tūrṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:145: 07,002.028a citrāṇi cāpāni ca vegavanti; jyāś cottamāḥ saṃhananopapannāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:146: 07,002.028c tūṇāṃś ca pūrṇān mahataḥ śarāṇām; āsajya gātrāvaraṇāni caiva
GE07mbh_07_u:147: 07,002.029a prāyātrikaṃ cānayatāśu sarvaṃ; kanyāḥ pūrṇaṃ vīrakāṃsyaṃ ca haimam 07,002.029c ānīya mālām avabadhya cāṅge; pravādayantv āśu jayāya bherīḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:148: 07,002.030a prayāhi sūtāśu yataḥ kirīṭī; vṛkodaro dharmasuto yamau ca
GE07mbh_07_u:149: 07,002.030c tān vā haniṣyāmi sametya saṃkhye; bhīṣmāya vaiṣyāmi hato
GE07mbh_07_u:151: 07,002.031a yasmin rājā satyadhṛtir yudhiṣṭhiraḥ; samāsthito bhīmasenārjunau ca
GE07mbh_07_u:152: 07,002.031c vāsudevaḥ sātyakiḥ sṛñjayāś ca; manye balaṃ tad ajayyaṃ mahīpaiḥ 07,002.032a taṃ cen mṛtyuḥ sarvaharo 'bhirakṣet; sadāpramattaḥ samare kirīṭinam

GE07mbh_07_u:300: 07,005.021c senāmadhyagataṃ droṇam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 07,005.022a varṇaśraiṣṭhyāt kulotpattyā śrutena vayasā dhiyā 07,005.022c vīryād dākṣyād adhṛṣyatvād arthajñānān nayāj jayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:301: 07,005.023a tapasā ca kṛtajñatvād vṛddhaḥ sarvaguṇair api
GE07mbh_07_u:302: 07,005.023c yukto bhavatsamo goptā rājñām anyo na vidyate
GE07mbh_07_u:303: 07,005.024a sa bhavān pātu naḥ sarvān vibudhān iva vāsavaḥ 07,005.024c bhavannetrāḥ parāñ jetum icchāmo dvijasattama 07,005.025a rudrāṇām iva kāpālī vasūnām iva pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:304: 07,005.025c kubera iva yakṣāṇāṃ marutām iva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:305: 07,005.026a vasiṣṭha iva viprāṇāṃ tejasām iva bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:306: 07,005.026c pitṝṇām iva dharmo 'tha ādityānām ivāmburāṭ 07,005.027a nakṣatrāṇām iva śaśī ditijānām ivośanāḥ 07,005.027b*0041_01 sarveṣām eva lokānāṃ viśvasya ca yathā kṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:308: 07,005.027c śreṣṭhaḥ senāpraṇetṝṇāṃ sa naḥ senāpatir bhava
GE07mbh_07_u:309: 07,005.028a akṣauhiṇyo daśaikā ca vaśagāḥ santu te 'nagha
GE07mbh_07_u:310: 07,005.028c tābhiḥ śatrūn prativyūhya jahīndro dānavān iva
GE07mbh_07_u:311: 07,005.029a prayātu no bhavān agre devānām iva pāvakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:312: 07,005.029c anuyāsyāmahe tv ājau saurabheyā ivarṣabham 07,005.030a ugradhanvā maheṣvāso divyaṃ visphārayan dhanuḥ 07,005.030c agre bhavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā no nārjunaḥ prasahiṣyate
GE07mbh_07_u:313: 07,005.031a dhruvaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraṃ saṃkhye sānubandhaṃ sabāndhavam 07,005.031c jeṣyāmi puruṣavyāghra bhavān senāpatir yadi 07,005.032a evam ukte tato droṇe jayety ūcur narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:315: 07,005.033a sainikāś ca mudā yuktā vardhayanti dvijottamam
GE07mbh_07_u:316: 07,005.033c duryodhanaṃ puraskṛtya prārthayanto mahad yaśaḥ 07,005.033d*0042_01 menire nihitān pārthān ātmanaś cottamaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:317: 07,005.033d*0043_01 duryodhanaṃ tadā rājan droṇo vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:318: 07,005.034 droṇa uvāca 07,005.034a vedaṃ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ vedāham arthavidyāṃ ca mānavīm
GE07mbh_07_u:319: 07,005.034c traiyambakam atheṣvastram astrāṇi vividhāni ca 07,005.035a ye cāpy uktā mayi guṇā bhavadbhir jayakāṅkṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:320: 07,005.035c cikīrṣus tān ahaṃ satyān yodhayiṣyāmi pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_07_u:321: 07,005.035d*0044_01 pārṣataṃ tu raṇe rājan na haniṣye kathaṃ cana 07,005.035d*0044_02 sa hi sṛṣṭo vadhārthāya mamaiva puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:322: 07,005.035d*0044_03 yodhayiṣye tu sainyāni nāśayan sarvasomakān 07,005.035d*0044_04 na ca māṃ pāṇḍavā yuddhe yodhayiṣyanti harṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:323: 07,005.036 saṃjaya uvāca 07,005.036a sa evam abhyanujñātaś cakre senāpatiṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:324: 07,005.036c droṇaṃ tava suto rājan vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:326: 07,005.037b*0045_01 svastivādaravaiś cānyaiḥ ślakṣṇaiḥ puṇyair manoramaiḥ 07,005.037c senāpatye yathā skandaṃ purā śakramukhāḥ surāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:327: 07,005.038a tato vāditraghoṣeṇa saha puṃsāṃ mahāsvanaiḥ 07,005.038c prādurāsīt kṛte droṇe harṣaḥ senāpatau tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:331: 07,005.040b*0046_01 prādurāsīn mahāśabdaḥ kṛte senāpatau dvije 07,005.040b*0046_02 senāpatye mahātmānaṃ sarve saṃhṛṣṭamānasāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:332: 07,005.040c satkṛtya vidhivad droṇaṃ jitān manyanta pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_07_u:333: 07,006.001 saṃjaya uvāca 07,006.001a senāpatyaṃ tu saṃprāpya bhāradvājo mahārathaḥ 07,006.001c yuyutsur vyūhya sainyāni prāyāt tava sutaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:334: 07,006.002a saindhavaś ca kaliṅgaś ca vikarṇaś ca tavātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:335: 07,006.002c dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvam āsthāya samatiṣṭhanta daṃśitāḥ 07,006.003a prapakṣaḥ śakunis teṣāṃ pravarair hayasādibhiḥ 07,006.003c yayau gāndhārakaiḥ sārdhaṃ vimalaprāsayodhibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:336: 07,006.004a kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca citraseno viviṃśatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:337: 07,006.004c duḥśāsanamukhā yattāḥ savyaṃ pārśvam apālayan 07,006.005a teṣāṃ prapakṣāḥ kāmbojāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:338: 07,006.005c yayur aśvair mahāvegaiḥ śakāś ca yavanaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:340: 07,006.006c śibayaḥ śūrasenāś ca śūdrāś ca maladaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:341: 07,006.007a sauvīrāḥ kitavāḥ prācyā dākṣiṇātyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:343: 07,006.008a harṣayan sarvasainyāni baleṣu balam ādadhat 07,006.008c yayau vaikartanaḥ karṇaḥ pramukhe sarvadhanvinām 07,006.009a tasya dīpto mahākāyaḥ svāny anīkāni harṣayan
GE07mbh_07_u:345: 07,006.010a na bhīṣmavyasanaṃ kaś cid dṛṣṭvā karṇam amanyata
GE07mbh_07_u:346: 07,006.010c viśokāś cābhavan sarve rājānaḥ kurubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:347: 07,006.011a hṛṣṭāś ca bahavo yodhās tatrājalpanta saṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:348: 07,006.011c na hi karṇaṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā yudhi sthāsyanti pāṇḍavāḥ 07,006.012a karṇo hi samare śakto jetuṃ devān savāsavān
GE07mbh_07_u:349: 07,006.012c kim u pāṇḍusutān yuddhe hīnavīryaparākramān 07,006.013a bhīṣmeṇa tu raṇe pārthāḥ pālitā bāhuśālinā
GE07mbh_07_u:350: 07,006.013c tāṃs tu karṇaḥ śarais tīkṣṇair nāśayiṣyaty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_07_u:351: 07,006.014a evaṃ bruvantas te 'nyonyaṃ hṛṣṭarūpā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:352: 07,006.014c rādheyaṃ pūjayantaś ca praśaṃsantaś ca niryayuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:354: 07,006.015c pareṣāṃ krauñca evāsīd vyūho rājan mahātmanām
GE07mbh_07_u:360: 07,006.018a dīpayām āsa tat sainyaṃ pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:361: 07,006.018c yathā prajvalitaḥ sūryo yugānte vai vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_07_u:362: 07,006.018d*0047_01 arjunena tathā rājan tāpitā bhāratī camūḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:363: 07,006.018d*0048_01 dīpyan dṛśyeta hi tathā ketuḥ sarvatra dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:364: 07,006.019a asyatām arjunaḥ śreṣṭho gāṇḍīvaṃ dhanuṣāṃ varam
GE07mbh_07_u:365: 07,006.019c vāsudevaś ca bhūtānāṃ cakrāṇāṃ ca sudarśanam
GE07mbh_07_u:366: 07,006.020a catvāry etāni tejāṃsi vahañ śvetahayo rathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:367: 07,006.020c pareṣām agratas tasthau kālacakram ivodyatam 07,006.021a evam etau mahātmānau balasenāgragāv ubhau 07,006.021c tāvakānāṃ mukhaṃ karṇaḥ pareṣāṃ ca dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:370: 07,006.022d*0049_01 didhakṣantau raṇe kruddhau netrābhyām itaretaram 07,006.022d*0049_02 niścarantau mahāvīryau dhunvānau dhanuṣī dṛḍhau 07,006.022d*0049_03 samucchritapatākena dhvajena rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:372: 07,006.023a tataḥ prayāte sahasā bhāradvāje mahārathe 07,006.023c antarnādena ghoreṇa vasudhā
GE07mbh_07_u:373: 07,006.024a tatas tumulam ākāśam āvṛṇot sadivākaram 07,006.024c vātoddhūtaṃ rajas tīvraṃ
GE07mbh_07_u:374: 07,006.025a anabhre pravavarṣa dyaur māṃsāsthirudhirāṇy uta 07,006.025c gṛdhrāḥ śyenā baḍāḥ kaṅkā vāyasāś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:375: 07,006.025e upary upari senāṃ te tadā paryapatan nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:376: 07,006.026a gomāyavaś ca prākrośan bhayadān dāruṇān ravān
GE07mbh_07_u:377: 07,006.026c akārṣur apasavyaṃ ca bahuśaḥ pṛtanāṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:378: 07,006.026e cikhādiṣanto māṃsāni pipāsantaś ca śoṇitam 07,006.027a apatad dīpyamānā ca sanirghātā sakampanā 07,006.027c ulkā jvalantī saṃgrāme pucchenāvṛtya sarvaśaḥ 07,006.028a pariveṣo mahāṃś cāpi savidyutstanayitnumān
GE07mbh_07_u:380: 07,006.029a ete cānye ca bahavaḥ prādurāsan sudāruṇāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:384: 07,006.031a te tv anyonyaṃ susaṃrabdhāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kauravaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:385: 07,006.031c pratyaghnan niśitair bāṇair jayagṛddhāḥ prahāriṇaḥ 07,006.032a sa pāṇḍavānāṃ mahatīṃ maheṣvāso mahādyutiḥ 07,006.032c vegenābhyadravat senāṃ kirañ śaraśataiḥ śitaiḥ 07,006.033a droṇam abhyudyataṃ dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavāḥ saha sṛñjayaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:386: 07,006.033c pratyagṛhṇaṃs tadā rājañ śaravarṣaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_07_u:389: 07,006.035a bahūnīha vikurvāṇo divyāny astrāṇi saṃyuge 07,006.035c apīḍayat kṣaṇenaiva droṇaḥ pāṇḍavasṛñjayān
GE07mbh_07_u:390: 07,006.036a te vadhyamānā droṇena vāsaveneva dānavāḥ 07,006.036c pāñcālāḥ samakampanta
GE07mbh_07_u:391: 07,006.037a tato divyāstravic chūro yājñasenir mahārathaḥ 07,006.037c abhinac charavarṣeṇa droṇānīkam anekadhā
GE07mbh_07_u:392: 07,006.038a droṇasya śaravarṣais tu śaravarṣāṇi bhāgaśaḥ 07,006.038c saṃnivārya tataḥ senāṃ kurūn apy avadhīd balī
GE07mbh_07_u:393: 07,006.039a saṃhṛtya tu tato droṇaḥ samavasthāpya cāhave
GE07mbh_07_u:394: 07,006.039c svam anīkaṃ mahābāhuḥ pārṣataṃ samupādravat 07,006.040a sa bāṇavarṣaṃ sumahad asṛjat pārṣataṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:395: 07,006.040c maghavān samabhikruddhaḥ sahasā dānaveṣv iva 07,006.041a te kampyamānā droṇena bāṇaiḥ pāṇḍavasṛñjayāḥ 07,006.041c punaḥ punar abhajyanta siṃhenevetare mṛgāḥ 07,006.042a atha paryapatad droṇaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ balaṃ balī
GE07mbh_07_u:396: 07,006.042c alātacakravad rājaṃs tad adbhutam ivābhavat 07,006.043a khacaranagarakalpaṃ kalpitaṃ śāstradṛṣṭyā; caladanilapatākaṃ hrādinaṃ valgitāśvam
GE07mbh_07_u:397: 07,006.043c sphaṭikavimalaketuṃ tāpanaṃ śātravāṇāṃ; rathavaram adhirūḍhaḥ saṃjahārārisenām
GE07mbh_07_u:398: 07,007.001 saṃjaya uvāca 07,007.001a tathā droṇam abhighnantaṃ sāśvasūtarathadvipān
GE07mbh_07_u:399: 07,007.001c vyathitāḥ pāṇḍavā dṛṣṭvā na cainaṃ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:401: 07,007.002c abravīt sarvato yattaiḥ kumbhayonir nivāryatām 07,007.003a tatrainam arjunaś caiva pārṣataś ca sahānugaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:402: 07,007.003c paryagṛhṇaṃs tataḥ sarve samāyāntaṃ mahārathāḥ 07,007.004a kekayā bhīmasenaś ca saubhadro 'tha ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:403: 07,007.004c yudhiṣṭhiro yamau matsyā drupadasyātmajās tathā 07,007.005a draupadeyāś ca saṃhṛṣṭā dhṛṣṭaketuḥ sasātyakiḥ 07,007.005c cekitānaś ca saṃkruddho yuyutsuś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:404: 07,007.006a ye cānye pārthivā rājan pāṇḍavasyānuyāyinaḥ 07,007.006c kulavīryānurūpāṇi cakruḥ karmāṇy anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:405: 07,007.007a saṃgṛhyamāṇāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavair vāhinīṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:407: 07,007.008a sa tīvraṃ kopam āsthāya rathe samaradurmadaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:409: 07,007.009a rathān aśvān narān nāgān abhidhāvaṃs tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:410: 07,007.009c cacāronmattavad droṇo vṛddho 'pi taruṇo yathā 07,007.010a tasya śoṇitadigdhāṅgāḥ śoṇās te vātaraṃhasaḥ 07,007.010c ājāneyā hayā rājann avibhrāntāḥ śriyaṃ dadhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:411: 07,007.011a tam antakam iva kruddham āpatantaṃ yatavratam
GE07mbh_07_u:412: 07,007.011c dṛṣṭvā saṃprādravan yodhāḥ pāṇḍavasya tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:413: 07,007.012a teṣāṃ pradravatāṃ bhīmaḥ punar āvartatām api
GE07mbh_07_u:414: 07,007.012c vīkṣatāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ cāsīc chabdaḥ paramadāruṇaḥ 07,007.013a śūrāṇāṃ harṣajanano bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:415: 07,007.013c dyāvāpṛthivyor vivaraṃ pūrayām āsa sarvataḥ 07,007.014a tataḥ punar api droṇo nāma viśrāvayan yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:416: 07,007.014c akarod raudram ātmānaṃ kirañ śaraśataiḥ parān
GE07mbh_07_u:417: 07,007.015a sa tathā tāny anīkāni pāṇḍaveyasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:418: 07,007.015c kālavan nyavadhīd droṇo yuveva sthaviro balī
GE07mbh_07_u:419: 07,007.016a utkṛtya ca śirāṃsy ugro bāhūn api sabhūṣaṇān
GE07mbh_07_u:420: 07,007.016c kṛtvā śūnyān rathopasthān udakrośan mahārathaḥ 07,007.017a tasya harṣapraṇādena bāṇavegena cābhibho
GE07mbh_07_u:421: 07,007.017c prākampanta raṇe yodhā gāvaḥ śītārditā iva
GE07mbh_07_u:423: 07,007.018c dhanuḥśabdena cākāśe śabdaḥ samabhavan mahān 07,007.019a athāsya bahuśo bāṇā niścarantaḥ sahasraśaḥ 07,007.019c vyāpya sarvā diśaḥ petur gajāśvarathapattiṣu 07,007.020a taṃ kārmukamahāvegam astrajvalitapāvakam
GE07mbh_07_u:424: 07,007.020c droṇam āsādayāṃ cakruḥ pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:425: 07,007.021a tān vai sarathahastyaśvān prāhiṇod yamasādanam 07,007.021c droṇo 'cireṇākaroc ca mahīṃ śoṇitakardamām
GE07mbh_07_u:426: 07,007.022a tanvatā paramāstrāṇi śarān satatam asyatā 07,007.022c droṇena vihitaṃ dikṣu bāṇajālam adṛśyata 07,007.023a padātiṣu rathāśveṣu vāraṇeṣu ca sarvaśaḥ 07,007.023c tasya vidyud ivābhreṣu caran ketur adṛśyata
GE07mbh_07_u:427: 07,007.024a sa kekayānāṃ pravarāṃś ca pañca; pāñcālarājaṃ ca śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:430: 07,007.025a taṃ bhīmasenaś ca dhanaṃjayaś ca; śineś ca naptā drupadātmajaś ca 07,007.025c śaibyātmajaḥ kāśipatiḥ śibiś ca; hṛṣṭā nadanto vyakirañ
GE07mbh_07_u:434: 07,007.026a teṣām atho droṇadhanurvimuktāḥ; patatriṇaḥ kāñcanacitrapuṅkhāḥ 07,007.026c bhittvā śarīrāṇi gajāśvayūnāṃ; jagmur mahīṃ śoṇitadigdhavājāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:435: 07,007.027a sā yodhasaṃghaiś ca rathaiś ca bhūmiḥ; śarair vibhinnair gajavājibhiś ca 07,007.027c pracchādyamānā patitair babhūva; samantato dyaur iva
GE07mbh_07_u:438: 07,007.028c anyāṃś ca vīrān samare pramṛdnād; droṇaḥ sutānāṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:440: 07,007.029a etāni cānyāni ca kauravendra; karmāṇi kṛtvā samare mahātmā
GE07mbh_07_u:441: 07,007.029c pratāpya lokān iva kālasūryo; droṇo gataḥ svargam ito hi rājan
GE07mbh_07_u:442: 07,007.029d*0051_01 sa tu kṛtvā mahatkarma droṇaḥ parabalārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:443: 07,007.030a evaṃ rukmarathaḥ śūro hatvā śatasahasraśaḥ 07,007.030c pāṇḍavānāṃ raṇe yodhān pārṣatena nipātitaḥ 07,007.031a akṣauhiṇīm abhyadhikāṃ śūrāṇām anivartinām
GE07mbh_07_u:444: 07,007.031c nihatya paścād dhṛtimān agacchat paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_07_u:445: 07,007.032a pāṇḍavaiḥ saha pāñcālair aśivaiḥ krūrakarmabhiḥ 07,007.032c hato rukmaratho rājan kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_07_u:446: 07,007.033a tato ninādo bhūtānām ākāśe samajāyata 07,007.033c sainyānāṃ ca tato rājann ācārye nihate yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:447: 07,007.034a dyāṃ dharāṃ khaṃ diśo vāri pradiśaś cānunādayan
GE07mbh_07_u:448: 07,007.034c aho dhig iti bhūtānāṃ śabdaḥ samabhavan mahān
GE07mbh_07_u:449: 07,007.035a devatāḥ pitaraś caiva pūrve ye cāsya bāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:450: 07,007.035c dadṛśur nihataṃ tatra bhāradvājaṃ mahāratham 07,007.036a pāṇḍavās tu jayaṃ labdhvā siṃhanādān pracakrire

GE07mbh_07_u:757: 07,011.013c sahasā niḥsṛto bhāvo yo 'sya nityaṃ pravartate 07,011.014a nākāro gūhituṃ śakyo bṛhaspatisamair api 07,011.014c tasmāt tava suto rājan prahṛṣṭo vākyam abravīt

GE07mbh_07_u:760: 07,011.016b*0090_03 sasāgaravanāṃ sphītāṃ vijitya vasudhām imām 07,011.016b*0090_04 viṣṇur dāsyati kṛṣṇāyai kuntyai vā puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:761: 07,011.016c ya eva caiṣāṃ śeṣaḥ syāt sa evāsmān na śeṣayet

GE07mbh_07_u:763: 07,011.017c punar yāsyanty araṇyāya kaunteyās tam anuvratāḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:766: 07,011.019c taṃ varaṃ sāntaraṃ tasmai dadau saṃcintya buddhimān
GE07mbh_07_u:767: 07,011.020 droṇa uvāca 07,011.020a na ced yudhiṣṭhiraṃ vīra pālayed arjuno yudhi

GE07mbh_07_u:769: 07,011.021a na hi pārtho raṇe śakyaḥ sendrair devāsurair api 07,011.021b*0092_01 sthite pārthe dharmarājo naiva śakyo mayā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:770: 07,011.021c pratyudyātum atas tāta naitad āmarṣayāmy aham

GE07mbh_07_u:772: 07,011.022c taruṇaḥ kīrtiyuktaś ca ekāyanagataś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:773: 07,011.023a astrāṇīndrāc ca rudrāc ca bhūyāṃsi samavāptavān

GE07mbh_07_u:775: 07,011.024a sa cāpakramyatāṃ yuddhād yenopāyena śakyate 07,011.024c apanīte tataḥ pārthe dharmarājo jitas tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:776: 07,011.025a grahaṇaṃ cej jayaṃ tasya manyase puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:777: 07,011.025c etena cābhyupāyena dhruvaṃ grahaṇam eṣyati 07,011.026a ahaṃ gṛhītvā rājānaṃ
GE07mbh_07_u:778: 07,011.026c ānayiṣyāmi te rājan vaśam adya na saṃśayaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:781: 07,011.028a phalgunasya samakṣaṃ tu na hi pārtho yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:782: 07,011.028c grahītuṃ samare śakyaḥ sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:783: 07,011.029 saṃjaya uvāca 07,011.029*0093_01 evam ukte tadā tasmin yuddhe devāsuropame
GE07mbh_07_u:784: 07,011.029a sāntaraṃ tu pratijñāte rājño droṇena nigrahe

GE07mbh_07_u:786: 07,011.030a pāṇḍaveṣu hi sāpekṣaṃ droṇaṃ jānāti te sutaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:789: 07,012.001 saṃjaya uvāca 07,012.001a tatas te sainikāḥ śrutvā taṃ yudhiṣṭhiranigraham
GE07mbh_07_u:791: 07,012.002a tat tu sarvaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ dharmarājena bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:793: 07,012.003a tataḥ sarvān samānāyya bhrātṝn sainyāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:794: 07,012.003c abravīd dharmarājas tu dhanaṃjayam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:795: 07,012.004a śrutaṃ te puruṣavyāghra droṇasyādya cikīrṣitam 07,012.004c yathā tan na bhavet satyaṃ tathā nītir vidhīyatām 07,012.005a sāntaraṃ hi pratijñātaṃ droṇenāmitrakarśana
GE07mbh_07_u:796: 07,012.005c tac cāntaram amogheṣau tvayi tena samāhitam
GE07mbh_07_u:797: 07,012.006a sa tvam adya mahābāho yudhyasva madanantaram
GE07mbh_07_u:798: 07,012.006c yathā duryodhanaḥ kāmaṃ nemaṃ droṇād avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_07_u:799: 07,012.007 arjuna uvāca 07,012.007a yathā me na vadhaḥ kārya ācāryasya kathaṃ cana 07,012.007c tathā tava parityāgo na me rājaṃś cikīrṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:800: 07,012.008a apy evaṃ pāṇḍava prāṇān utsṛjeyam ahaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:801: 07,012.008c pratīyāṃ nāham ācāryaṃ tvāṃ na jahyāṃ kathaṃ cana 07,012.009a tvāṃ nigṛhyāhave rājan dhārtarāṣṭro yam icchati
GE07mbh_07_u:802: 07,012.009c na sa taṃ jīvaloke 'smin kāmaṃ prāptaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:803: 07,012.010a prapated dyauḥ sanakṣatrā pṛthivī śakalībhavet 07,012.010c na tvāṃ droṇo nigṛhṇīyāj jīvamāne mayi dhruvam
GE07mbh_07_u:804: 07,012.011a yadi tasya raṇe sāhyaṃ kurute vajrabhṛt svayam
GE07mbh_07_u:805: 07,012.011c devair vā sahito daityair na tvāṃ prāpsyaty asau mṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:806: 07,012.012a mayi jīvati rājendra na bhayaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:807: 07,012.012c droṇād astrabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhāt sarvaśastrabhṛtām api 07,012.012d*0095_01 anyac ca brūyāṃ rājendra pratijñāṃ mama nityadā
GE07mbh_07_u:808: 07,012.013a na smarāmy anṛtāṃ vācaṃ na smarāmi parājayam

GE07mbh_07_u:810: 07,012.014 saṃjaya uvāca 07,012.014a tataḥ śaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca mṛdaṅgāś cānakaiḥ saha 07,012.014c prāvādyanta mahārāja pāṇḍavānāṃ niveśane
GE07mbh_07_u:811: 07,012.015a siṃhanādaś ca saṃjajñe pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām 07,012.015c dhanurjyātalaśabdaś ca gaganaspṛk subhairavaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:813: 07,012.017c śanair upeyur anyonyaṃ yotsyamānāni saṃyuge 07,012.018a tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam 07,012.018c pāṇḍavānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca droṇapāñcālyayor api 07,012.019a yatamānāḥ prayatnena droṇānīkaviśātane
GE07mbh_07_u:814: 07,012.019c na śekuḥ sṛñjayā rājaṃs tad dhi droṇena pālitam 07,012.020a tathaiva tava putrasya rathodārāḥ prahāriṇaḥ 07,012.020c na śekuḥ pāṇḍavīṃ senāṃ pālyamānāṃ kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_07_u:815: 07,012.021a āstāṃ te stimite sene rakṣyamāṇe parasparam

GE07mbh_07_u:821: 07,012.026a na cainaṃ pāṇḍaveyānāṃ kaś cic chaknoti māriṣa

GE07mbh_07_u:824: 07,012.028c pārṣato yatra tatraiva mamṛde pāṇḍuvāhinīm 07,013.001 saṃjaya uvāca 07,013.001a tataḥ sa pāṇḍavānīke janayaṃs tumulaṃ mahat

GE07mbh_07_u:835: 07,013.010c kavacoḍupasaṃyuktāṃ māṃsapaṅkasamākulām 07,013.010d*0096_01 keśaśaivālasaṃyuktāṃ māṃsāsṛkkardamāruṇām 07,013.011a medomajjāsthisikatām uṣṇīṣavaraphenilām 07,013.011c saṃgrāmajaladāpūrṇāṃ prāsamatsyasamākulām 07,013.012a naranāgāśvasaṃbhūtāṃ śaravegaughavāhinīm 07,013.012c śarīradāruśṛṅgāṭāṃ bhujanāgasamākulām 07,013.013a uttamāṅgopalatalāṃ nistriṃśajhaṣasevitām 07,013.013c rathanāgahradopetāṃ nānābharaṇanīrajām 07,013.014a mahārathaśatāvartāṃ bhūmireṇūrmimālinīm 07,013.014c mahāvīryavatāṃ saṃkhye sutarāṃ bhīrudustarām

GE07mbh_07_u:2797: 07,044.011a evam uktvā tu saubhadram abhidudrāva vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:2799: 07,044.012a so 'bhimanyuṃ tribhir bāṇair viddhvā vakṣasy athānadat 07,044.012c tribhiś ca dakṣiṇe bāhau savye ca niśitais tribhiḥ 07,044.012d*0306_01 so 'bhimanyus tatas tasya chittvā praṇadato balī 07,044.013a sa tasyeṣvasanaṃ chittvā phālguṇiḥ savyadakṣiṇau 07,044.013c bhujau śiraś ca svakṣibhru kṣitau kṣipram apātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:2800: 07,044.014a dṛṣṭvā rukmarathaṃ rugṇaṃ putraṃ śalyasya māninam
GE07mbh_07_u:2807: 07,044.017c dṛṣṭvaikaṃ samare śūraṃ saubhadram aparājitam 07,044.018a chādyamānaṃ śaravrātair hṛṣṭo duryodhano 'bhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:2808: 07,044.018c vaivasvatasya bhavanaṃ gatam enam amanyata 07,044.019a suvarṇapuṅkhair iṣubhir nānāliṅgais tribhis tribhiḥ 07,044.019c adṛśyam ārjuniṃ cakrur nimeṣāt te nṛpātmajāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2809: 07,044.020a sasūtāśvadhvajaṃ tasya syandanaṃ taṃ ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:2810: 07,044.020c ācitaṃ samapaśyāma śvāvidhaṃ śalalair iva 07,044.021a sa gāḍhaviddhaḥ kruddhaś ca tottrair gaja ivārditaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2811: 07,044.021c gāndharvam astram āyacchad rathamāyāṃ ca yojayat
GE07mbh_07_u:2812: 07,044.022a arjunena tapas taptvā gandharvebhyo yad āhṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:2814: 07,044.023a ekaḥ sa śatadhā rājan dṛśyate sma sahasradhā
GE07mbh_07_u:2815: 07,044.023c alātacakravat saṃkhye kṣipram astrāṇi darśayan 07,044.024a rathacaryāstramāyābhir mohayitvā paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2816: 07,044.024c bibheda śatadhā rājañ śarīrāṇi mahīkṣitām 07,044.024d*0307_01 bhinnānīkāś ca diṅmūḍhā bhūyaḥ saṃtrastacetasaḥ 07,044.024d*0307_02 bhallair utkṛttaśirasaḥ paralokam athāviśan
GE07mbh_07_u:2817: 07,044.025a prāṇāḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ saṃkhye preṣitā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2818: 07,044.025c rājan prāpur amuṃ lokaṃ śarīrāṇy avaniṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2819: 07,044.026a dhanūṃṣy aśvān niyantṝṃś ca dhvajān bāhūṃś ca sāṅgadān 07,044.026c śirāṃsi ca śitair bhallais teṣāṃ ciccheda phālguniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2824: 07,044.029a rathinaḥ kuñjarān aśvān padātīṃś cāvamarditān 07,044.029c dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaḥ kṣipram upāyāt tam amarṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2825: 07,044.030a tayoḥ kṣaṇam ivāpūrṇaḥ saṃgrāmaḥ samapadyata 07,044.030c athābhavat te vimukhaḥ putraḥ śaraśatārditaḥ 07,045.001 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 07,045.001a yathā vadasi me sūta ekasya bahubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:2826: 07,045.001c saṃgrāmaṃ tumulaṃ ghoraṃ jayaṃ caiva mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2828: 07,045.002c kiṃ tu nātyadbhutaṃ teṣāṃ yeṣāṃ dharmo vyapāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2830: 07,045.003c saubhadre pratipattiṃ kāṃ pratyapadyanta māmakāḥ 07,045.003d*0308_01 mūlaṃ hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ daivataṃ svargavāsinām 07,045.003d*0308_02 sa kṛṣṇo daivataṃ yeṣāṃ kiṃ teṣāṃ duḥkhasaṃbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2831: 07,045.003d*0308_03 karmaṇāṃ pratipanne 'rthe kālena pariṇāmite 07,045.003d*0308_04 kā cintā mahatī bhūpa cintayā bādhyate jaḍaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2833: 07,045.003d*0308_06 tyāgaṃ vinā mahārāja samādhānaṃ na vidyate
GE07mbh_07_u:2834: 07,045.003d*0308_07 bhavāṃs tadrahito rājañ śṛṇuṣvācarite phalam 07,045.004 saṃjaya uvāca 07,045.004*0309_01 tāvakās tava putrāś ca vīkṣamāṇāḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_07_u:2838: 07,045.005a hatān bhrātṝn pitṝn putrān suhṛtsaṃbandhibāndhavān 07,045.005c utsṛjyotsṛjya samiyus tvarayanto hayadvipān
GE07mbh_07_u:2839: 07,045.006a tān prabhagnāṃs tathā dṛṣṭvā droṇo drauṇir bṛhadbalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2840: 07,045.006c kṛpo duryodhanaḥ karṇaḥ kṛtavarmātha saubalaḥ 07,045.006d*0311_01 tathā sarve samabhyetya saubhadraṃ drutam arpayan
GE07mbh_07_u:2841: 07,045.006d*0311_02 tathā vinihatāṃ dṛṣṭvā tava senām anāthavat
GE07mbh_07_u:2843: 07,045.007c te 'pi pautreṇa te rājan prāyaśo vimukhīkṛtāḥ 07,045.007d*0312_01 saubhadreṇa mahārāja śakrapratimatejasā
GE07mbh_07_u:2844: 07,045.008a ekas tu sukhasaṃvṛddho bālyād darpāc ca nirbhayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2846: 07,045.009a tam anvag evāsya pitā putragṛddhī nyavartata
GE07mbh_07_u:2847: 07,045.009c anu duryodhanaṃ cānye nyavartanta mahārathāḥ 07,045.010a taṃ te 'bhiṣiṣicur bāṇair meghā girim ivāmbubhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2848: 07,045.010c sa ca tān pramamāthaiko viṣvag vāto yathāmbudān
GE07mbh_07_u:2849: 07,045.011a pautraṃ tu tava durdharṣaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ priyadarśanam
GE07mbh_07_u:2850: 07,045.011c pituḥ samīpe tiṣṭhantaṃ śūram udyatakārmukam 07,045.012a atyantasukhasaṃvṛddhaṃ dhaneśvarasutopamam 07,045.012c āsasāda raṇe kārṣṇir matto mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_07_u:2851: 07,045.012d*0313_01 abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddham ārjuniṃ paramām āstravit
GE07mbh_07_u:2852: 07,045.012d*0313_02 śṛṇu vākyaṃ mahābāho abhimanyo mahābala 07,045.012d*0313_03 gaccha tvaṃ pāṇḍavāñ śīghraṃ mā yuddhaṃ kuru suvrata 07,045.012d*0313_04 tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā abhimanyuḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_07_u:2853: 07,045.012d*0313_05 uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ kruddhaḥ prahasann iva bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:2854: 07,045.012d*0313_06 gamiṣyāmi ciraṃ bhrātaḥ sarvān etān nihatya vai
GE07mbh_07_u:2855: 07,045.012d*0313_07 pāṇḍavān prati cādyaiva iti satyaṃ vadāmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:2856: 07,045.012d*0314_01 siṃhaśāvo vane yadvat puṇḍarīkaśiśuṃ yathā 07,045.013a lakṣmaṇena tu saṃgamya saubhadraḥ paravīrahā 07,045.013c śaraiḥ suniśitais tīkṣṇair bāhvor urasi cārpitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2857: 07,045.014a saṃkruddho vai mahābāhur daṇḍāhata ivoragaḥ 07,045.014c pautras tava mahārāja tava pautram abhāṣata
GE07mbh_07_u:2858: 07,045.015a sudṛṣṭaḥ kriyatāṃ loko amuṃ lokaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:2859: 07,045.015c paśyatāṃ bāndhavānāṃ tvāṃ nayāmi yamasādanam 07,045.015d*0315_01 tasya cātikramaṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇo yuddhakovidaḥ 07,045.015d*0315_02 yuddhaṃ cakre tadā tena śastrāstrair matimān nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:2860: 07,045.015d*0315_03 tayor yuddham atīvāsīd budhāṅgārakayor iva 07,045.015d*0315_04 anyonyaṃ * jighāṃsator balavāsavayor iva
GE07mbh_07_u:2861: 07,045.015d*0315_05 śarajālair mahāghorair vivyadhus te parasparam 07,045.015d*0315_06 lakṣmaṇo niśitair bāṇair daśabhiś ca stanāntare
GE07mbh_07_u:2863: 07,045.015d*0315_08 pañcabhiḥ pañcabhir bāṇair nijaghne rathavājinaḥ 07,045.015d*0315_09 sārathim iṣuṇaikena dhvajaṃ caikeṣuṇāhanat
GE07mbh_07_u:2864: 07,045.015d*0315_10 tribhir bāṇair dhanuś chittvā ārjuniḥ sumahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2865: 07,045.016a evam uktvā tato bhallaṃ saubhadraḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_07_u:2867: 07,045.017a sa tasya bhujanirmukto lakṣmaṇasya sudarśanam 07,045.017c sunasaṃ subhru keśāntaṃ śiro 'hārṣīt sakuṇḍalam
GE07mbh_07_u:2868: 07,045.017e lakṣmaṇaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā hā hety uccukruśur janāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2869: 07,045.017f*0316_01 sa bhrātṝn rājaputrāṃś ca kumārasyānuyāyinām 07,045.017f*0316_02 jaghāna bāṇaiḥ saubhadraḥ sahasrāṇi caturdaśa 07,045.017f*0316_03 aṣṭau rathasahasrāṇi sapta nāgaśatāni ca 07,045.018a tato duryodhanaḥ kruddhaḥ priye putre nipātite
GE07mbh_07_u:2870: 07,045.018c hatainam iti cukrośa kṣatriyān kṣatriyarṣabhaḥ 07,045.019a tato droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ karṇo droṇaputro bṛhadbalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2871: 07,045.019c kṛtavarmā ca hārdikyaḥ ṣaḍ rathāḥ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:2872: 07,045.020a sa tān viddhvā śitair bāṇair vimukhīkṛtya cārjuniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2873: 07,045.020c vegenābhyapatat kruddhaḥ saindhavasya mahad balam 07,045.021a āvavrus tasya panthānaṃ gajānīkena daṃśitāḥ 07,045.021c kaliṅgāś ca niṣādāś ca krāthaputraś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:2874: 07,045.021e tat prasaktam ivātyarthaṃ yuddham āsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:2875: 07,045.022a tatas tat kuñjarānīkaṃ vyadhamad dhṛṣṭam ārjuniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2877: 07,045.023a tataḥ krāthaḥ śaravrātair ārjuniṃ samavākirat 07,045.023c athetare saṃnivṛttāḥ punar droṇamukhā rathāḥ 07,045.023e paramāstrāṇi dhunvānāḥ saubhadram abhidudruvuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2878: 07,045.024a tān nivāryārjunir bāṇaiḥ krāthaputram athārdayat 07,045.024c śaraugheṇāprameyeṇa tvaramāṇo jighāṃsayā
GE07mbh_07_u:2880: 07,045.025c chatraṃ dhvajaṃ niyantāram aśvāṃś cāsya nyapātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:2882: 07,045.026c yukte tasmin hate vīrāḥ prāyaśo vimukhābhavan
GE07mbh_07_u:2883: 07,046.001 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 07,046.001a tathā praviṣṭaṃ taruṇaṃ saubhadram aparājitam 07,046.001c kulānurūpaṃ kurvāṇaṃ saṃgrāmeṣv apalāyinam
GE07mbh_07_u:2884: 07,046.002a ājāneyaiḥ subalibhir yuktam aśvais trihāyanaiḥ 07,046.002c plavamānam ivākāśe ke śūrāḥ samavārayan 07,046.003 saṃjaya uvāca 07,046.003a abhimanyuḥ praviśyaiva tāvakān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ 07,046.003c akarod vimukhān sarvān pārthivān pāṇḍunandanaḥ 07,046.004a taṃ tu droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ karṇo drauṇiś ca sabṛhadbalaḥ 07,046.004c kṛtavarmā ca hārdikyaḥ ṣaḍ rathāḥ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:2885: 07,046.005a dṛṣṭvā tu saindhave bhāram atimātraṃ samāhitam
GE07mbh_07_u:2886: 07,046.005c sainyaṃ tava mahārāja yudhiṣṭhiram upādravat 07,046.006a saubhadram itare vīram abhyavarṣañ śarāmbubhiḥ 07,046.006c tālamātrāṇi cāpāni vikarṣanto mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2887: 07,046.007a tāṃs tu sarvān maheṣvāsān sarvavidyāsu niṣṭhitān
GE07mbh_07_u:2888: 07,046.007c vyaṣṭambhayad raṇe bāṇaiḥ saubhadraḥ paravīrahā 07,046.008a droṇaṃ pañcāśatā viddhvā viṃśatyā ca bṛhadbalam
GE07mbh_07_u:2889: 07,046.008c aśītyā kṛtavarmāṇaṃ kṛpaṃ ṣaṣṭyā śilīmukhaiḥ 07,046.009a rukmapuṅkhair mahāvegair
GE07mbh_07_u:2890: 07,046.009c avidhyad daśabhir bāṇair aśvatthāmānam ārjuniḥ 07,046.010a sa karṇaṃ karṇinā karṇe pītena niśitena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:2891: 07,046.010c phālgunir dviṣatāṃ madhye vivyādha parameṣuṇā 07,046.011a pātayitvā kṛpasyāśvāṃs tathobhau pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_07_u:2892: 07,046.011c athainaṃ daśabhir bāṇaiḥ pratyavidhyat stanāntare 07,046.012a tato vṛndārakaṃ vīraṃ kurūṇāṃ kīrtivardhanam 07,046.012c putrāṇāṃ tava vīrāṇāṃ paśyatām avadhīd balī
GE07mbh_07_u:2893: 07,046.013a taṃ drauṇiḥ pañcaviṃśatyā kṣudrakāṇāṃ samarpayat 07,046.013c varaṃ varam amitrāṇām ārujantam abhītavat 07,046.014a sa tu bāṇaiḥ śitais tūrṇaṃ pratyavidhyata māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:2895: 07,046.015a ṣaṣṭyā śarāṇāṃ taṃ drauṇis tigmadhāraiḥ sutejanaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2896: 07,046.015c ugrair nākampayad viddhvā mainākam iva parvatam
GE07mbh_07_u:2897: 07,046.016a sa tu drauṇiṃ trisaptatyā hemapuṅkhair ajihmagaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2899: 07,046.017a tasmin droṇo bāṇaśataṃ putragṛddhī nyapātayat 07,046.017c aśvatthāmā tathāṣṭau ca parīpsan pitaraṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:2900: 07,046.018a karṇo dvāviṃśatiṃ bhallān kṛtavarmā caturdaśa 07,046.018c bṛhadbalas tu pañcāśat kṛpaḥ śāradvato daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:2901: 07,046.019a tāṃs tu pratyavadhīt sarvān daśabhir daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2902: 07,046.019c tair ardyamānaḥ saubhadraḥ sarvato niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2903: 07,046.020a taṃ kosalānām adhipaḥ karṇinātāḍayad dhṛdi 07,046.020c sa tasyāśvān dhvajaṃ cāpaṃ sūtaṃ cāpātayat kṣitau
GE07mbh_07_u:2904: 07,046.021a atha kosalarājas tu virathaḥ khaḍgacarmadhṛt 07,046.021c iyeṣa phālguneḥ kāyāc chiro hartuṃ sakuṇḍalam
GE07mbh_07_u:2905: 07,046.022a sa kosalānāṃ bhartāraṃ rājaputraṃ bṛhadbalam 07,046.022c hṛdi vivyādha bāṇena sa bhinnahṛdayo 'patat
GE07mbh_07_u:2906: 07,046.023a babhañja ca sahasrāṇi daśa rājan mahātmanām
GE07mbh_07_u:2908: 07,046.024a tathā bṛhadbalaṃ hatvā saubhadro vyacarad raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:2909: 07,046.024c viṣṭambhayan maheṣvāsān yodhāṃs tava śarāmbubhiḥ 07,047.001 saṃjaya uvāca 07,047.001a sa karṇaṃ karṇinā karṇe punar vivyādha phālguniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2910: 07,047.001c śaraiḥ pañcāśatā cainam avidhyat kopayan bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:2911: 07,047.002a prativivyādha rādheyas tāvadbhir atha taṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2912: 07,047.002c sa tair ācitasarvāṅgo bahv aśobhata bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:2913: 07,047.003a karṇaṃ cāpy akarot kruddho rudhirotpīḍavāhinam 07,047.003c karṇo 'pi vibabhau śūraḥ śaraiś citro 'sṛgāplutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2915: 07,047.004a tāv ubhau śaracitrāṅgau rudhireṇa samukṣitau 07,047.004c babhūvatur mahātmānau puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukau 07,047.005a atha karṇasya sacivān ṣaṭ śūrāṃś citrayodhinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2917: 07,047.006a athetarān maheṣvāsān daśabhir daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ 07,047.006c pratyavidhyad asaṃbhrāntas tad adbhutam ivābhavat 07,047.007a māgadhasya punaḥ putraṃ hatvā ṣaḍbhir ajihmagaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2918: 07,047.007c sāśvaṃ sasūtaṃ taruṇam aśvaketum apātayat 07,047.008a mārtikāvatakaṃ bhojaṃ tataḥ kuñjaraketanam
GE07mbh_07_u:2919: 07,047.008b*0318_01 magadhādhipateś cāpi jayatsenasya vai śiraḥ 07,047.008c kṣurapreṇa samunmathya nanāda visṛjañ śarān 07,047.009a tasya dauḥśāsanir viddhvā caturbhiś caturo hayān
GE07mbh_07_u:2920: 07,047.009c sūtam ekena vivyādha daśabhiś cārjunātmajam 07,047.010a tato dauḥśāsaniṃ kārṣṇir viddhvā saptabhir āśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2921: 07,047.010c saṃrambhād raktanayano vākyam uccair athābravīt 07,047.011a pitā tavāhavaṃ tyaktvā gataḥ kāpuruṣo yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:2922: 07,047.011c diṣṭyā tvam api jānīṣe yoddhuṃ na tv adya mokṣyase
GE07mbh_07_u:2924: 07,047.012c nārācaṃ visasarjāsmai taṃ drauṇis tribhir ācchinat
GE07mbh_07_u:2925: 07,047.013a tasyārjunir dhvajaṃ chittvā śalyaṃ tribhir atāḍayat
GE07mbh_07_u:2926: 07,047.013c taṃ śalyo navabhir bāṇair gārdhrapatrair atāḍayat
GE07mbh_07_u:2927: 07,047.013d*0319_01 hṛdyasaṃbhrāntavad rājaṃs tad adbhutam ivābhavat 07,047.014a tasyārjunir dhvajaṃ chittvā ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_07_u:2930: 07,047.015c sūryabhāsaṃ ca pañcaitān hatvā vivyādha saubalam
GE07mbh_07_u:2931: 07,047.016a taṃ saubalas tribhir viddhvā duryodhanam athābravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:2932: 07,047.016c sarva enaṃ pramathnīmaḥ puraikaikaṃ hinasti naḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2933: 07,047.017a athābravīt tadā droṇaṃ karṇo vaikartano vṛṣā
GE07mbh_07_u:2934: 07,047.017c purā sarvān pramathnāti brūhy asya vadham āśu naḥ 07,047.018a tato droṇo maheṣvāsaḥ sarvāṃs tān pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_07_u:2935: 07,047.018c asti vo 'syāntaraṃ kaś cit kumārasya prapaśyati

GE07mbh_07_u:3943: 07,051.031e ātmāpahāriṇāṃ yā ca yā ca mithyābhiśaṃsinām

GE07mbh_07_u:3953: 07,051.035c teṣāṃ gatim iyāṃ kṣipraṃ na ced dhanyāṃ jayadratham 07,051.036a dharmād apetā ye cānye mayā nātrānukīrtitāḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:3959: 07,051.037f*0372_01 gāṇḍīvahasto rājñāṃ ca samakṣaṃ pṛthivīpate 07,051.038a asurasuramanuṣyāḥ pakṣiṇo voragā vā; pitṛrajanicarā vā brahmadevarṣayo vā 07,051.038c caram acaram apīdaṃ yat paraṃ cāpi tasmāt; tad api mama ripuṃ taṃ rakṣituṃ naiva śaktāḥ 07,051.039a yadi viśati rasātalaṃ tadagryaṃ; viyad api devapuraṃ diteḥ puraṃ vā

GE07mbh_07_u:3974: 07,051.043d*0373_14 tāvakaṃ tan mahārājaṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ samapadyata 07,052.001 saṃjaya uvāca 07,052.001a śrutvā tu taṃ mahāśabdaṃ pāṇḍūnāṃ putragṛddhinām
GE07mbh_07_u:3975: 07,052.001c cāraiḥ pravedite tatra samutthāya jayadrathaḥ 07,052.002a śokasaṃmūḍhahṛdayo duḥkhenābhihato bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:3977: 07,052.003a jagāma samitiṃ rājñāṃ saindhavo vimṛśan bahu
GE07mbh_07_u:3978: 07,052.003c sa teṣāṃ naradevānāṃ sakāśe paridevayan 07,052.004a abhimanyoḥ pitur bhītaḥ savrīḍo vākyam abravīt

GE07mbh_07_u:4001: 07,052.016c satyavrato mahābāhur vikarṇo durmukhaḥ sahaḥ 07,052.017a duḥśāsanaḥ subāhuś ca kaliṅgaś cāpy udāyudhaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:4007: 07,052.019a akṣauhiṇyo daśaikā ca madīyās tava rakṣaṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:4008: 07,052.019c yattā yotsyanti mā bhais tvaṃ saindhava vyetu te bhayam

GE07mbh_07_u:4028: 07,052.033d*0381_01 tataḥ praharṣaḥ sainyānāṃ tavāpy āsīd viśāṃ pate

GE07mbh_07_u:4030: 07,053.002a bhrātṝṇāṃ matam ājñāya tvayā vācā pratiśrutam

GE07mbh_07_u:4035: 07,053.005c siṃhanādaḥ savāditraḥ sumahān iha taiḥ śrutaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:4609: 07,061.031c teṣām api samudrāntā pitṛpaitāmahī mahī 07,061.031d*0452_01 na ca tvābhibhaviṣyanti hitvā dharmaṃ pṛthātmajāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4611: 07,061.032c santi no jñātayas tāta yeṣāṃ śroṣyanti pāṇḍavāḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:4639: 07,061.051c durnītaṃ vā sunītaṃ vā tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya

GE07mbh_07_u:4941: 07,067.018a tato bhojo naravyāghraṃ duḥsahaḥ kurusattama 07,067.018c avidhyat tūrṇam avyagro daśabhiḥ kaṅkapatribhiḥ 07,067.019a tam arjunaḥ śitenājau rājan vivyādha patriṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:4942: 07,067.019c punaś cānyais tribhir bāṇair mohayann iva sātvatam
GE07mbh_07_u:4943: 07,067.020a bhojas tu prahasan pārthaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca mādhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:4945: 07,067.021a tasyārjuno dhanuś chittvā vivyādhainaṃ trisaptabhiḥ 07,067.021c śarair agniśikhākāraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4946: 07,067.022a athānyad dhanur ādāya kṛtavarmā mahārathaḥ 07,067.022c pañcabhiḥ sāyakais tūrṇaṃ vivyādhorasi bhārata 07,067.023a punaś ca niśitair bāṇaiḥ pārthaṃ vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4947: 07,067.023c taṃ pārtho navabhir bāṇair ājaghāna stanāntare
GE07mbh_07_u:4948: 07,067.024a viṣaktaṃ dṛśya kaunteyaṃ kṛtavarmarathaṃ prati 07,067.024c cintayām āsa vārṣṇeyo na naḥ kālātyayo bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:4949: 07,067.025a tataḥ kṛṣṇo 'bravīt pārthaṃ kṛtavarmaṇi mā dayām
GE07mbh_07_u:4951: 07,067.026a tataḥ sa kṛtavarmāṇaṃ mohayitvārjunaḥ śaraiḥ 07,067.026c abhyagāj javanair aśvaiḥ kāmbojānām anīkinīm 07,067.027a amarṣitas tu hārdikhyaḥ praviṣṭe śvetavāhane 07,067.027c vidhunvan saśaraṃ cāpaṃ pāñcālyābhyāṃ samāgataḥ 07,067.028a cakrarakṣau tu pāñcālyāv arjunasya padānugau 07,067.028c paryavārayad āyāntau kṛtavarmā ratheṣubhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4952: 07,067.029a tāv avidhyat tato bhojaḥ sarvapāraśavaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4953: 07,067.029c tribhir eva yudhāmanyuṃ caturbhiś cottamaujasam 07,067.030a tāv apy enaṃ vivyadhatur daśabhir daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4954: 07,067.030c saṃcicchidatur apy asya dhvajaṃ kārmukam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:4955: 07,067.031a athānyad dhanur ādāya hārdikyaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ 07,067.031c kṛtvā vidhanuṣau vīrau śaravarṣair avākirat 07,067.032a tāv anye dhanuṣī sajye kṛtvā bhojaṃ vijaghnatuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4957: 07,067.033a na lebhāte tu tau dvāraṃ vāritau kṛtavarmaṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:4959: 07,067.034a anīkāny ardayan yuddhe tvaritaḥ śvetavāhanaḥ 07,067.034c nāvadhīt kṛtavarmāṇaṃ prāptam apy arisūdanaḥ 07,067.035a taṃ dṛṣṭvā tu tathāyāntaṃ śūro rājā śrutāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4960: 07,067.035c abhyadravat susaṃkruddho vidhunvāno mahad dhanuḥ 07,067.035d*0481_01 dra[drā]vyamāṇeṣu sainyeṣu pāṇḍavena tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4961: 07,067.035d*0481_02 śrutāyudho mahātejāḥ kiran bāṇān samabhyayāt 07,067.036a sa pārthaṃ tribhir ānarchat saptatyā ca janārdanam
GE07mbh_07_u:4963: 07,067.037a tam arjuno navatyā tu śarāṇāṃ nataparvaṇām
GE07mbh_07_u:4964: 07,067.037c ājaghāna bhṛśaṃ kruddhas tottrair iva mahādvipam
GE07mbh_07_u:4965: 07,067.038a sa tan na mamṛṣe rājan pāṇḍaveyasya vikramam
GE07mbh_07_u:4967: 07,067.039a tasyārjuno dhanuś chittvā śarāvāpaṃ nikṛtya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:4969: 07,067.040a athānyad dhanur ādāya sa rājā krodhamūrchitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4970: 07,067.040c vāsaviṃ navabhir bāṇair bāhvor urasi cārpayat
GE07mbh_07_u:4972: 07,067.041c śarair anekasāhasraiḥ pīḍayām āsa bhārata 07,067.042a aśvāṃś cāsyāvadhīt tūrṇaṃ sārathiṃ ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4973: 07,067.042c vivyādha cainaṃ saptatyā nārācānāṃ mahābalaḥ 07,067.043a hatāśvaṃ ratham utsṛjya sa tu rājā śrutāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4974: 07,067.043c abhyadravad raṇe pārthaṃ gadām udyamya vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:4975: 07,067.044a varuṇasyātmajo vīraḥ sa tu rājā śrutāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4976: 07,067.044c parṇāśā jananī yasya śītatoyā mahānadī 07,067.045a tasya mātābravīd vākyaṃ varuṇaṃ putrakāraṇāt 07,067.045c avadhyo 'yaṃ bhavelloke śatrūṇāṃ tanayo mama
GE07mbh_07_u:4977: 07,067.046a varuṇas tv abravīt prīto dadāmy asmai varaṃ hitam 07,067.046c divyam astraṃ sutas te 'yaṃ yanāvadhyo bhaviṣyati 07,067.047a nāsti cāpy amaratvaṃ vai manuṣyasya kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:4979: 07,067.048a durdharṣas tv eṣa śatrūṇāṃ raṇeṣu bhavitā sadā
GE07mbh_07_u:4980: 07,067.048c astrasyāsya prabhāvād vai vyetu te mānaso jvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4981: 07,067.049a ity uktvā varuṇaḥ prādād gadāṃ mantrapuraskṛtām
GE07mbh_07_u:4982: 07,067.049c yām āsādya durādharṣaḥ sarvaloke śrutāyudhaḥ 07,067.050a uvāca cainaṃ bhagavān punar eva jaleśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4983: 07,067.050c ayudhyati na moktavyā sā tvayy eva pated iti 07,067.050d*0482_01 hanyād eṣā pratīpaṃ hi prayoktāram iti prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:4984: 07,067.050d*0482_02 na cākarot sa tadvākyaṃ prāpte kāle śrutāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4985: 07,067.051a sa tayā vīraghātinyā janārdanam atāḍayat 07,067.051c pratijagrāha tāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pīnenāṃsena vīryavān 07,067.052a nākampayata śauriṃ sā vindhyaṃ girim ivānilaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4987: 07,067.052b*0483_02 vivyādha pāṇḍavaḥ śīghraṃ jaleśvarasutasya vai 07,067.052b*0483_03 sā jvalantī maholkeva samāsādya janārdanam 07,067.052c pratyabhyayāt taṃ viproḍhā kṛtyeva duradhiṣṭhitā 07,067.053a jaghāna cāsthitaṃ vīraṃ śrutāyudham amarṣaṇam 07,067.053b*0484_01 sa papāta hato bhūmau viśirā vibhujo balī
GE07mbh_07_u:4988: 07,067.053b*0484_02 sa bhagna iva vātena bahuśākho vanaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4989: 07,067.053b*0484_03 sā visphurantī jvalitā vajravegasamā gadā 07,067.053c hatvā śrutāyudhaṃ vīraṃ jagatīm anvapadyata 07,067.053d*0485_01 gadāṃ nivartitāṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ ca śrutāyudham
GE07mbh_07_u:4990: 07,067.054a hāhākāro mahāṃs tatra sainyānāṃ samajāyata 07,067.054c svenāstreṇa hataṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutāyudham ariṃdamam 07,067.055a ayudhyamānāya hi sā keśavāya narādhipa 07,067.055c kṣiptā śrutāyudhenātha tasmāt tam avadhīd gadā
GE07mbh_07_u:4991: 07,067.056a yathoktaṃ varuṇenājau tathā sa nidhanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4992: 07,067.056c vyasuś cāpy apatad bhūmau prekṣatāṃ sarvadhanvinām
GE07mbh_07_u:4993: 07,067.057a patamānas tu sa babhau parṇāśāyāḥ priyaḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4994: 07,067.057c saṃbhagna iva vātena bahuśākho vanaspatiḥ 07,067.058a tataḥ sarvāṇi sainyāni senāmukhyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4995: 07,067.058c prādravanta hataṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutāyudham ariṃdamam 07,067.059a tatha kāmbojarājasya putraḥ śūraḥ sudakṣiṇaḥ 07,067.059c abhyayāj javanair aśvaiḥ phalgunaṃ śatrusūdanam 07,067.060a tasya pārthaḥ śarān sapta preṣayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:4996: 07,067.060c te taṃ śūraṃ vinirbhidya prāviśan dharaṇītalam
GE07mbh_07_u:4999: 07,067.062a vāsudevaṃ tribhir viddhvā punaḥ pārthaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5000: 07,067.062c tasya pārtho dhanuś chittvā ketuṃ ciccheda māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:5001: 07,067.063a bhallābhyāṃ bhṛśatīkṣṇābhyāṃ taṃ ca vivyādha pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5002: 07,067.063c sa tu pārthaṃ tribhir viddhvā siṃhanādam athānadat
GE07mbh_07_u:5003: 07,067.064a sarvapāraśavīṃ caiva śaktiṃ śūraḥ sudakṣiṇaḥ 07,067.064c saghaṇṭāṃ prāhiṇod ghorāṃ kruddho gāṇḍīvadhanvane 07,067.065a sā jvalantī maholkeva tam āsādya mahāratham
GE07mbh_07_u:5007: 07,067.066a taṃ caturdaśabhiḥ pārtho nārācaiḥ kaṅkapatribhiḥ 07,067.066c sāśvadhvajadhanuḥsūtaṃ vivyādhācintyavikramaḥ 07,067.066e rathaṃ cānyaiḥ subahubhiś cakre viśakalaṃ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5009: 07,067.067c bibheda hṛdi bāṇena pṛthudhāreṇa pāṇḍavaḥ 07,067.068a sa bhinnamarmā srastāṅgaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5010: 07,067.068c papātābhimukhaḥ śūro yantramukta iva dhvajaḥ 07,067.069a gireḥ śikharajaḥ śrīmān suśākhaḥ supratiṣṭhitaḥ 07,067.069c nirbhagna iva vātena karṇikāro himātyaye 07,067.069d*0487_01 vikīrṇaḥ patito rājā prasārya vipulau bhujau
GE07mbh_07_u:5011: 07,067.069d*0488_01 dhārayann agnisaṃkāśāṃ śirasā kāñcanīṃ srajam 07,067.070a śete sma nihato bhūmau kāmbojāstaraṇocitaḥ 07,067.070b*0489_01 mahārhābharaṇopetaḥ sānumān iva parvataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5012: 07,067.070c sudarśanīyas tāmrākṣaḥ karṇinā sa sudakṣiṇaḥ 07,067.070e putraḥ kāmbojarājasya pārthena vinipātitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5013: 07,067.070f*0490_01 aśobhata mahābāhur vyasur bhūmau nipātitaḥ 07,067.070f*0491_01 śocayan sarvabhūtāni keśavaṃ ca sahārjunam 07,067.071a tataḥ sarvāṇi sainyāni vyadravanta sutasya te
GE07mbh_07_u:5014: 07,067.071c hataṃ śrutāyudhaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāmbojaṃ ca sudakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:5015: 07,068.001 saṃjaya uvāca 07,068.001a hate sudakṣiṇe rājan vīre caiva śrutāyudhe
GE07mbh_07_u:5016: 07,068.001c javenābhyadravan pārthaṃ kupitāḥ sainikās tava 07,068.002a abhīṣāhāḥ śūrasenāḥ śibayo 'tha vasātayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5017: 07,068.002c abhyavarṣaṃs tato rājañ śaravarṣair dhanaṃjayam 07,068.003a teṣāṃ ṣaṣṭiśatānāryān prāmathnāt pāṇḍavaḥ śaraiḥ 07,068.003c te sma bhītāḥ palāyanta vyāghrāt kṣudramṛgā iva
GE07mbh_07_u:5018: 07,068.004a te nivṛtya punaḥ pārthaṃ sarvataḥ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:5019: 07,068.004c raṇe sapatnān nighnantaṃ jigīṣantan parān yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:5020: 07,068.005a teṣām āpatatāṃ tūrṇaṃ gāṇḍīvapreṣitaiḥ śaraiḥ 07,068.005c śirāṃsi pātayām āsa bāhūṃś caiva dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5021: 07,068.005d*0492_01 uccakarta śirāṃsy ugro nāḷebhya iva paṅkajān
GE07mbh_07_u:5022: 07,068.006a śirobhiḥ patitais tatra bhūmir āsīn nirantarā
GE07mbh_07_u:5025: 07,068.007c śrutāyuś cācyutāyuś ca dhanaṃjayam ayudhyatām 07,068.008a balinau spardhinau vīrau kulajau bāhuśālinau 07,068.008c tāv enaṃ śaravarṣāṇi savyadakṣiṇam asyatām 07,068.009a tvarāyuktau mahārāja prārthayānau mahad yaśaḥ 07,068.009c arjunasya vadhaprepsū putrārthe tava dhanvinau 07,068.010a tāv arjunaṃ sahasreṇa patriṇāṃ nataparvaṇām 07,068.010c pūrayām āsatuḥ kruddhau taḍāgaṃ jaladau yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:5026: 07,068.011a śrutāyuś ca tataḥ kruddhas tomareṇa dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:5027: 07,068.011c ājaghāna rathaśreṣṭhaḥ pītena niśitena ca 07,068.012a so 'tividdho balavatā śatruṇā śatrukarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5028: 07,068.012c ājagāma paraṃ mohaṃ mohayan keśavaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:5029: 07,068.013a etasminn eva kāle tu so 'cyutāyur mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5030: 07,068.013c śūlena bhṛśatīkṣṇena tāḍayām āsa pāṇḍavam 07,068.014a kṣate kṣāraṃ sa hi dadau pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5032: 07,068.015a tataḥ sarvasya sainyasya tāvakasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:5033: 07,068.015c siṃhanādo mahān āsīd dhataṃ matvā dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:5034: 07,068.016a kṛṣṇaś ca bhṛśasaṃtapto dṛṣṭvā pārthaṃ vicetasam
GE07mbh_07_u:5035: 07,068.016c āśvāsayat suhṛdyābhir vāgbhis tatra dhanaṃjayam 07,068.017a tatas tau rathināṃ śreṣṭhau labdhalakṣau dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:5036: 07,068.017c vāsudevaṃ ca vārṣṇeyaṃ śaravarṣaiḥ samantataḥ 07,068.018a sacakrakūbararathaṃ sāśvadhvajapatākinam 07,068.018c adṛśyaṃ cakratur yuddhe tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:5037: 07,068.019a pratyāśvastas tu bībhatsuḥ śanakair iva bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:5038: 07,068.019c pretarājapuraṃ prāpya punaḥ pratyāgato yathā 07,068.020a saṃchannaṃ śarajālena rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā sakeśavam 07,068.020c śatrū cābhimukhau dṛṣṭvā dīpyamānāv ivānalau 07,068.021a prāduścakre tataḥ pārthaḥ śākram astraṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5039: 07,068.021c tasmād āsan sahasrāṇi śarāṇāṃ nataparvaṇām 07,068.022a te jaghnus tau maheṣvāsau tābhyāṃ sṛṣṭāṃś ca sāyakān 07,068.022c vicerur ākāśagatāḥ pārthabāṇavidāritāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5040: 07,068.023a pratihatya śarāṃs tūrṇaṃ śaravegena pāṇḍavaḥ 07,068.023c pratasthe tatra tatraiva yodhayan vai mahārathān
GE07mbh_07_u:5041: 07,068.024a tau ca phalgunabāṇaughair vibāhuśirasau kṛtau 07,068.024c vasudhām anvapadyetāṃ vātanunnāv iva drumau 07,068.025a śrutāyuṣaś ca nidhanaṃ vadhaś caivācyutāyuṣaḥ 07,068.025c lokavismāpanam abhūt samudrasyeva śoṣaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:5042: 07,068.026a tayoḥ padānugān hatvā punaḥ pañcaśatān rathān
GE07mbh_07_u:5043: 07,068.026c abhyagād bhāratīṃ senāṃ nighnan pārtho varān varān
GE07mbh_07_u:5044: 07,068.027a śrutāyuṣaṃ ca nihataṃ prekṣya caivācyutāyuṣam 07,068.027c ayutāyuś ca saṃkruddho dīrghāyuś caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:5045: 07,068.028a putrau tayor naraśreṣṭhau kaunteyaṃ pratijagmatuḥ 07,068.028c kirantau vividhān bāṇān pitṛvyasanakarśitau
GE07mbh_07_u:5046: 07,068.029a tāv arjuno muhūrtena śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ 07,068.029c preṣayat paramakruddho yamasya sadanaṃ prati 07,068.030a loḍayantam anīkāni dvipaṃ padmasaro yathā 07,068.030c nāśaknuvan vārayituṃ pārthaṃ kṣatriyapuṃgavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5047: 07,068.031a aṅgās tu gajavāreṇa pāṇḍavaṃ paryavārayan 07,068.031c kruddhāḥ sahasraśo rājañ śikhitā hastisādinaḥ 07,068.032a duryodhanasamādiṣṭāḥ kuñjaraiḥ parvatopamaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5048: 07,068.032c prācyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca kaliṅgapramukhā nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5049: 07,068.033a teṣām āpatatāṃ śīghraṃ gāṇḍīvapreṣitaiḥ śaraiḥ 07,068.033c nicakarta śirāṃsy ugrau bāhūn api subhūṣaṇān
GE07mbh_07_u:5050: 07,068.034a taiḥ śirobhir mahī kīrṇā bāhubhiś ca sahāṅgadaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5051: 07,068.034c babhau kanakapāṣāṇā bhujagair iva saṃvṛtā 07,068.035a bāhavo viśikhaiś chinnāḥ śirāṃsy unmathitāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:5052: 07,068.035c cyavamānāny adṛśyanta drumebhya iva pakṣiṇaḥ 07,068.036a śaraiḥ sahasraśo viddhā dvipāḥ prasrutaśoṇitāḥ 07,068.036c vyadṛśyantādrayaḥ kāle gairikāmbusravā iva
GE07mbh_07_u:5053: 07,068.037a nihatāḥ śerate smānye bībhatsor niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5056: 07,068.038c rudhireṇānuliptāṅgā bhānti citraiḥ śarair hatāḥ 07,068.039a śoṇitaṃ nirvamanti sma dvipāḥ pārthaśarāhatāḥ 07,068.039c sahasraśaś chinnagātrāḥ sārohāḥ sapadānugāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5057: 07,068.040a cukruśuś ca nipetuś ca babhramuś cāpare diśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5058: 07,068.040c bhṛśaṃ trastāś ca bahudhā svānena mamṛdur gajāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5060: 07,068.041a vidanty asuramāyāṃ ye sughorā ghoracakṣuṣaḥ 07,068.041c yavanāḥ pāradāś caiva śakāś ca sunikaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:5064: 07,068.042c dārvābhisārā daradāḥ puṇḍrāś ca saha bāhlikaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5065: 07,068.043a na te sma śakyāḥ saṃkhyātuṃ vrātāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:5663: 07,076.038a kṛṣṇapārthau maheṣvāsau vyatikramyātha te sutaḥ 07,076.038c agrataḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ pratīyāya narādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:5664: 07,076.039a tataḥ sarveṣu sainyeṣu vāditrāṇi prahṛṣṭavat 07,076.039c prāvādyan samatikrānte tava putre dhanaṃjayam 07,076.040a siṃhanādaravāś cāsañ śaṅkhadundubhimiśritāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5665: 07,076.040c dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaṃ tatra kṛṣṇayoḥ pramukhe sthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:5666: 07,076.041a ye ca te sindhurājasya goptāraḥ pāvakopamāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5667: 07,076.041c te prahṛṣyanta samare dṛṣṭvā putraṃ tavābhibho
GE07mbh_07_u:5668: 07,076.042a dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaṃ kṛṣṇas tv atikrāntaṃ sahānugam
GE07mbh_07_u:5669: 07,076.042c abravīd arjunaṃ rājan prāptakālam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5670: 07,077.001 vāsudeva uvāca 07,077.001a suyodhanam atikrāntam enaṃ paśya dhanaṃjaya 07,077.001c āpadgatam imaṃ manye nāsty asya sadṛśo rathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5672: 07,077.002c dṛḍhāstraś citrayodhī ca dhārtarāṣṭro mahābalaḥ 07,077.003a atyantasukhasaṃvṛddho mānitaś ca mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5673: 07,077.003c kṛtī ca satataṃ pārtha nityaṃ dveṣṭi ca pāṇḍavān 07,077.004a tena yuddham ahaṃ manye prāptakālaṃ tavānagha
GE07mbh_07_u:5674: 07,077.004c atra vo dyūtam āyātaṃ vijayāyetarāya vā
GE07mbh_07_u:5675: 07,077.005a atra krodhaviṣaṃ pārtha vimuñca cirasaṃbhṛtam 07,077.005c eṣa mūlam anarthānāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathaḥ 07,077.006a so 'yaṃ prāptas tavākṣepaṃ paśya sāphalyam ātmanaḥ 07,077.006c kathaṃ hi rājā rājyārthī tvayā gaccheta saṃyugam
GE07mbh_07_u:5676: 07,077.007a diṣṭyā tv idānīṃ saṃprāpta eṣa te bāṇagocaram
GE07mbh_07_u:5677: 07,077.007c sa yathā jīvitaṃ jahyāt tathā kuru dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:5679: 07,077.008c na ca te saṃyuge vīryaṃ jānāti puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:5680: 07,077.009a tvāṃ hi lokās trayaḥ pārtha sasurāsuramānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5681: 07,077.009c notsahante raṇe jetuṃ kim utaikaḥ suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5682: 07,077.010a sa diṣṭyā samanuprāptas tava pārtha rathāntikam
GE07mbh_07_u:5683: 07,077.010c jahy enaṃ vai mahābāho yathā vṛtraṃ puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5684: 07,077.011a eṣa hy anarthe satataṃ parākrāntas tavānagha
GE07mbh_07_u:5685: 07,077.011c nikṛtyā dharmarājaṃ ca dyūte vañcitavān ayam
GE07mbh_07_u:5686: 07,077.012a bahūni sunṛśaṃsāni kṛtāny etena mānada 07,077.012c yuṣmāsu pāpamatinā apāpeṣv eva nityadā 07,077.013a tam anāryaṃ sadā kṣudraṃ puruṣaṃ kāmacāriṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:5687: 07,077.013c āryāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā jahi pārthāvicārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:5688: 07,077.014a nikṛtyā rājyaharaṇaṃ vanavāsaṃ ca pāṇḍava 07,077.014c parikleśaṃ ca kṛṣṇāyā hṛdi kṛtvā parākrama
GE07mbh_07_u:5689: 07,077.015a diṣṭyaiṣa tava bāṇānāṃ gocare parivartate 07,077.015c pratighātāya kāryasya diṣṭyā ca yatate 'grataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5690: 07,077.016a diṣṭyā jānāti saṃgrāme yoddhavyaṃ hi tvayā saha
GE07mbh_07_u:5691: 07,077.016c diṣṭyā ca saphalāḥ pārtha sarve kāmā hi kāmitāḥ 07,077.017a tasmāj jahi raṇe pārtha dhārtarāṣṭraṃ kulādhamam
GE07mbh_07_u:5692: 07,077.017c yathendreṇa hataḥ pūrvaṃ jambho devāsure mṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:5693: 07,077.018a asmin hate tvayā sainyam anāthaṃ bhidyatām idam
GE07mbh_07_u:5694: 07,077.018c vairasyāsyās tv avabhṛtho mūlaṃ chindhi durātmanām
GE07mbh_07_u:5695: 07,077.019 saṃjaya uvāca 07,077.019a taṃ tathety abravīt pārthaḥ kṛtyarūpam idaṃ mama
GE07mbh_07_u:5696: 07,077.019c sarvam anyad anādṛtya gaccha yatra suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5697: 07,077.020a yenaitad dīrghakālaṃ no bhuktaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE07mbh_07_u:5698: 07,077.020c apy asya yudhi vikramya chindyāṃ mūrdhānam āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:5699: 07,077.021a api tasyā anarhāyāḥ parikleśasya mādhava 07,077.021c kṛṣṇāyāḥ śaknuyāṃ gantuṃ padaṃ keśapradharṣaṇe 07,077.021d*0548_01 apy ahaṃ tāni duḥkhāni pūrvavṛttāni mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:5700: 07,077.021d*0548_02 duryodhanaṃ raṇe hatvā pratimokṣye kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:5701: 07,077.022a ity evaṃ vādinau hṛṣṭau kṛṣṇau śvetān hayottamān
GE07mbh_07_u:5702: 07,077.022c preṣayām āsatuḥ saṃkhye prepsantau taṃ narādhipam
GE07mbh_07_u:5703: 07,077.023a tayoḥ samīpaṃ saṃprāpya putras te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:5704: 07,077.023c na cakāra bhayaṃ prāpte bhaye mahati māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:5705: 07,077.024a tad asya kṣatriyās tatra sarva evābhyapūjayan
GE07mbh_07_u:5707: 07,077.025a tataḥ sarvasya sainyasya tāvakasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:5708: 07,077.025c mahān nādo hy abhūt tatra dṛṣṭvā rājānam āhave 07,077.026a tasmiñ janasamunnāde pravṛtte bhairave sati 07,077.026c kadarthīkṛtya te putraḥ pratyamitram avārayat 07,077.027a āvāritas tu kaunteyas tava putreṇa dhanvinā
GE07mbh_07_u:5709: 07,077.027c saṃrambham agamad bhūyaḥ sa ca tasmin paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5712: 07,077.029a dṛṣṭvā tu pārthaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:5713: 07,077.029c prahasann iva putras te yoddhukāmaḥ samāhvayat
GE07mbh_07_u:5714: 07,077.030a tataḥ prahṛṣṭo dāśārhaḥ pāṇḍavaś ca dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5716: 07,077.031a tau hṛṣṭarūpau saṃprekṣya kauraveyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5717: 07,077.031c nirāśāḥ samapadyanta putrasya tava jīvite 07,077.032a śokam īyuḥ paraṃ caiva kuravaḥ sarva eva te 07,077.032c amanyanta ca putraṃ te vaiśvānaramukhe hutam
GE07mbh_07_u:5718: 07,077.033a tathā tu dṛṣṭvā yodhās te prahṛṣṭau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_07_u:5719: 07,077.033c hato rājā hato rājety ūcur evaṃ bhayārditāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5721: 07,077.034c vyetu vo bhīr ahaṃ kṛṣṇau preṣayiṣyāmi mṛtyave
GE07mbh_07_u:5722: 07,077.035a ity uktvā sainikān sarvāñ jayāpekṣī narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5723: 07,077.035c pārtham ābhāṣya saṃrambhād idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:5724: 07,077.036a pārtha yac chikṣitaṃ te 'straṃ divyaṃ mānuṣam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:5725: 07,077.036c tad darśaya mayi kṣipraṃ yadi jāto 'si pāṇḍunā
GE07mbh_07_u:5726: 07,077.037a yad balaṃ tava vīryaṃ ca keśavasya tathaiva ca 07,077.037c tat kuruṣva mayi kṣipraṃ paśyāmas tava pauruṣam
GE07mbh_07_u:5727: 07,077.038a asmat parokṣaṃ karmāṇi pravadanti kṛtāni te
GE07mbh_07_u:5729: 07,078.001 saṃjaya uvāca 07,078.001a evam uktvārjunaṃ rājā tribhir marmātigaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5730: 07,078.001c pratyavidhyan mahāvegaiś caturbhiś caturo hayān 07,078.002a vāsudevaṃ ca daśabhiḥ pratyavidhyat stanāntare 07,078.002c pratodaṃ cāsya bhallena chittvā bhūmāv apātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:5731: 07,078.003a taṃ caturdaśabhiḥ pārthaś citrapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ 07,078.003c avidhyat tūrṇam avyagras te 'syābhraśyanta varmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5732: 07,078.004a teṣāṃ vaiphalyam ālokya punar nava ca pañca ca 07,078.004c prāhiṇon niśitān bāṇāṃs te cābhraśyanta varmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5733: 07,078.005a aṣṭāviṃśat tu tān bāṇān astān viprekṣya niṣphalān
GE07mbh_07_u:5734: 07,078.005b*0549_01 vaiphalyaṃ cāgatān bāṇāñ chinnān parapuraṃjayaḥ 07,078.005c abravīt paravīraghnaḥ kṛṣṇo 'rjunam idaṃ vacaḥ 07,078.006a adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ paśyāmi śilānām iva sarpaṇam 07,078.006c tvayā saṃpreṣitāḥ pārtha nārthaṃ kurvanti patriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5735: 07,078.007a kaccid gāṇḍīvataḥ prāṇās tathaiva bharatarṣabha 07,078.007c muṣṭiś ca te yathāpūrvaṃ bhujayoś ca balaṃ tava 07,078.008a na ced vidher ayaṃ kālaḥ prāptaḥ syād adya paścimaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5736: 07,078.008c tava caivāsya śatroś ca tan mamācakṣva pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5737: 07,078.009a vismayo me mahān pārtha tava dṛṣṭvā śarān imān 07,078.009c vyarthān nipatataḥ saṃkhye duryodhanarathaṃ prati 07,078.010a vajrāśanisamā ghorāḥ parakāyāvabhedinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5738: 07,078.010c śarāḥ kurvanti te nārthaṃ pārtha kādya viḍambanā
GE07mbh_07_u:5739: 07,078.011 arjuna uvāca 07,078.011a droṇenaiṣā matiḥ kṛṣṇa dhārtarāṣṭre niveśitā 07,078.011c ante vihitam astrāṇām etat kavacadhāraṇam 07,078.012a asminn antarhitaṃ kṛṣṇa trailokyam api varmaṇi
GE07mbh_07_u:5740: 07,078.012c eko droṇo hi vedaitad ahaṃ tasmāc ca sattamāt 07,078.013a na śakyam etat kavacaṃ bāṇair bhettuṃ kathaṃ cana 07,078.013c api vajreṇa govinda svayaṃ maghavatā yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:5741: 07,078.014a jānaṃs tvam api vai kṛṣṇa māṃ vimohayase katham 07,078.014c yadvṛttaṃ triṣu lokeṣu yac ca keśava vartate
GE07mbh_07_u:5742: 07,078.015a tathā bhaviṣyad yac caiva tat sarvaṃ viditaṃ tava 07,078.015c na tv evaṃ veda vai kaś cid yathā tvaṃ madhusūdana
GE07mbh_07_u:5743: 07,078.016a eṣa duryodhanaḥ kṛṣṇa droṇena vihitām imām
GE07mbh_07_u:5744: 07,078.016c tiṣṭhaty abhītavat saṃkhye bibhrat kavacadhāraṇām 07,078.017a yat tv atra vihitaṃ kāryaṃ naiṣa tad vetti mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:5745: 07,078.017c strīvad eṣa bibharty etāṃ yuktāṃ kavacadhāraṇām
GE07mbh_07_u:5746: 07,078.018a paśya bāhvoś ca me vīryaṃ dhanuṣaś ca janārdana 07,078.018c parājayiṣye kauravyaṃ kavacenāpi rakṣitam
GE07mbh_07_u:5747: 07,078.019a idam aṅgirase prādād deveśo varma bhāsvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:5748: 07,078.019b*0550_01 tasmād bṛhaspatiḥ prāpa tataḥ prāpa puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5749: 07,078.019c punar dadau surapatir mahyaṃ varma sasaṃgraham
GE07mbh_07_u:5750: 07,078.020a daivaṃ yady asya varmaitad brahmaṇā vā svayaṃ kṛtam 07,078.020c naitad gopsyati durbuddhim adya bāṇahataṃ mayā
GE07mbh_07_u:5751: 07,078.021 saṃjaya uvāca 07,078.021a evam uktvārjuno bāṇān abhimantrya vyakarṣayat 07,078.021b*0551_01 mānavāstreṇa mānārhaḥ sūkṣmāvaraṇabhedinā
GE07mbh_07_u:5753: 07,078.021e tān asyāstreṇa ciccheda drauṇiḥ sarvāstraghātinā 07,078.022a tān nikṛttān iṣūn dṛṣṭvā dūrato brahmavādinā
GE07mbh_07_u:5755: 07,078.023a naitad astraṃ mayā śakyaṃ dviḥ prayoktuṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_07_u:5756: 07,078.023c astraṃ mām eva hanyād dhi paśya tv adya balaṃ mama
GE07mbh_07_u:5757: 07,078.024a tato duryodhanaḥ kṛṣṇau navabhir nataparvabhiḥ 07,078.024c avidhyata raṇe rājañ śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥ 07,078.024e bhūya evābhyavarṣac ca samare kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau 07,078.025a śaravarṣeṇa mahatā tato 'hṛṣyanta tāvakāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5759: 07,078.026a tataḥ kruddho raṇe pārthaḥ sṛkkaṇī parisaṃlihan
GE07mbh_07_u:5760: 07,078.026c nāpaśyata tato 'syāṅgaṃ yan na syād varmarakṣitam
GE07mbh_07_u:5762: 07,078.027c hayāṃś cakāra nirdehān ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_07_u:5763: 07,078.028a dhanur asyācchinac citraṃ hastāvāpaṃ ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:5764: 07,078.028c rathaṃ ca śakalīkartuṃ savyasācī pracakrame 07,078.029a duryodhanaṃ ca bāṇābhyāṃ tīkṣṇābhyāṃ virathīkṛtam 07,078.029b*0552_01 prayatnakārī kaunteyo nakhamāṃsāntareṣubhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5766: 07,078.029c avidhyad dhastatalayor ubhayor arjunas tadā 07,078.030a taṃ kṛcchrām āpadaṃ prāptaṃ dṛṣṭvā paramadhanvinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5768: 07,078.031a te rathair bahusāhasraiḥ kalpitaiḥ kuñjarair hayaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5769: 07,078.031c padātyoghaiś ca saṃrabdhaiḥ parivavrur dhanaṃjayam 07,078.032a atha nārjunagovindau ratho vāpi vyadṛśyata 07,078.032c astravarṣeṇa mahatā janaughaiś cāpi saṃvṛtau 07,078.033a tato 'rjuno 'stravīryeṇa nijaghne tāṃ varūthinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:5771: 07,078.034a te hatā hanyamānāś ca nyagṛhṇaṃs taṃ rathottamam
GE07mbh_07_u:5772: 07,078.034c sa rathastambhitas tasthau krośamātraṃ samantataḥ 07,078.035a tato 'rjunaṃ vṛṣṇivīras tvarito vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:5773: 07,078.035c dhanur visphārayātyartham ahaṃ dhmāsyāmi cāmbujam 07,078.036a tato visphārya balavad gāṇḍīvaṃ jaghnivān ripūn
GE07mbh_07_u:5775: 07,078.037a pāñcajanyaṃ ca balavad dadhmau tāreṇa keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5781: 07,078.038a tasya śaṅkhasya nādena dhanuṣo nisvanena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:5782: 07,078.038c niḥsattvāś ca sasattvāś ca kṣitau petus tadā janāḥ 07,078.039a tair vimukto ratho reje vāyvīrita ivāmbudaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5783: 07,078.039c jayadrathasya goptāras tataḥ kṣubdhāḥ sahānugāḥ 07,078.040a te dṛṣṭvā sahasā pārthaṃ goptāraḥ saindhavasya tu
GE07mbh_07_u:5784: 07,078.040c cakrur nādān bahuvidhān kampayanto vasuṃdharām 07,078.041a bāṇaśabdaravāṃś cogrān vimiśrāñ śaṅkhanisvanaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5786: 07,078.042a taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ tāvakānāṃ samutthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:5788: 07,078.043a tena śabdena mahatā pūriteyaṃ vasuṃdharā 07,078.043c saśailā sārṇavadvīpā sapātālā viśāṃ pate 07,078.044a sa śabdo bharataśreṣṭha vyāpya sarvā diśo daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:5790: 07,078.045a tāvakā rathinas tatra dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayau 07,078.045c saṃrambhaṃ paramaṃ prāptās tvaramāṇā mahārathāḥ 07,078.046a atha kṛṣṇau mahābhāgau tāvakā dṛśya daṃśitau
GE07mbh_07_u:5791: 07,078.046c abhyadravanta saṃkruddhās tad adbhutam ivābhavat 07,079.001 saṃjaya uvāca 07,079.001a tāvakās tu samīkṣyaiva vṛṣṇyandhakakurūttamau
GE07mbh_07_u:5792: 07,079.001c prāg atvarañ jighāṃsantas tathaiva vijayaḥ parān
GE07mbh_07_u:5794: 07,079.002c dīpayanto diśaḥ sarvā jvaladbhir iva pāvakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5795: 07,079.003a rukmapṛṣṭhaiś ca duṣprekṣyaiḥ kārmukaiḥ pṛthivīpate 07,079.003c kūjadbhir atulān nādān roṣitair uragair iva
GE07mbh_07_u:5796: 07,079.004a bhūriśravāḥ śalaḥ karṇo vṛṣaseno jayadrathaḥ 07,079.004c kṛpaś ca madrarājaś ca drauṇiś ca rathināṃ varaḥ 07,079.005a te pibanta ivākāśam aśvair aṣṭau mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5797: 07,079.005c vyarājayan daśa diśo vaiyāghrair hemacandrakaiḥ 07,079.006a te daṃśitāḥ susaṃrabdhā rathair meghaughanisvanaiḥ 07,079.006c samāvṛṇvan diśaḥ sarvāḥ pārthaṃ ca viśikhaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5798: 07,079.007a kaulūtakā hayāś citrā vahantas tān mahārathān
GE07mbh_07_u:5799: 07,079.007c vyaśobhanta tadā śīghrā dīpayanto diśo daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:5801: 07,079.008c pārvatīyair nadījaiś ca saindhavaiś ca hayottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5802: 07,079.009a kuruyodhavarā rājaṃs tava putraṃ parīpsavaḥ 07,079.009c dhanaṃjayarathaṃ śīghraṃ sarvataḥ samupādravan
GE07mbh_07_u:5803: 07,079.010a te pragṛhya mahāśaṅkhān dadhmuḥ puruṣasattamāḥ 07,079.010c pūrayanto divaṃ rājan pṛthivīṃ ca sasāgarām
