GE07mbh_07_u:6231: 07,085.038c kauravāś ca yathā hṛṣṭā vinadanti muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6232: 07,085.038d*0577_01 saṃjaya uvāca 07,085.038d*0577_01 vyaktam adya vinaśyante sarvalokamahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6233: 07,085.038d*0577_02 śrutvā tu ninadaṃ ghoraṃ pāñcajanyasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:6236: 07,085.040a bāṣpagadgadayā vācā muhyamāno muhur muhuḥ 07,085.040c kṛtyasyānantarāpekṣī śaineyaṃ śinipuṃgavam
GE07mbh_07_u:6237: 07,085.041a yaḥ sa dharmaḥ purā dṛṣṭaḥ sadbhiḥ śaineya śāśvataḥ 07,085.041c sāṃparāye suhṛtkṛtye tasya kālo 'yam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6238: 07,085.042a sarveṣv api ca yodheṣu cintayañ śinipuṃgava
GE07mbh_07_u:6239: 07,085.042c tvattaḥ suhṛttamaṃ kaṃ cin nābhijānāmi sātyake
GE07mbh_07_u:6240: 07,085.043a yo hi prītamanā nityaṃ yaś ca nityam anuvrataḥ 07,085.043c sa kārye sāṃparāye tu niyojya iti me matiḥ 07,085.044a yathā ca keśavo nityaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:6241: 07,085.044c tathā tvam api vārṣṇeya kṛṣṇatulyaparākramaḥ 07,085.045a so 'haṃ bhāraṃ samādhāsye tvayi taṃ voḍhum arhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:6242: 07,085.045c abhiprāyaṃ ca me nityaṃ na vṛthā kartum arhasi 07,085.046a sa tvaṃ bhrātur vayasyasya guror api ca saṃyuge 07,085.046c kuru kṛcchre sahāyārtham arjunasya nararṣabha 07,085.047a tvaṃ hi satyavrataḥ śūro mitrāṇām abhayaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6243: 07,085.047c loke vikhyāyase vīra karmabhiḥ satyavāg iti
GE07mbh_07_u:6244: 07,085.048a yo hi śaineya mitrārthe yudhyamānas tyajet tanum
GE07mbh_07_u:6245: 07,085.048c pṛthivīṃ vā dvijātibhyo yo dadyāt samam eva tat 07,085.049a śrutāś ca bahavo 'smābhī rājāno ye divaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6246: 07,085.049c dattvemāṃ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ brāhmaṇebhyo yathāvidhi 07,085.049d*0578_01 dīyamānā hi bahubhir dāsyate ca muhur mahī
GE07mbh_07_u:6247: 07,085.049d*0578_02 nanu kaś cid raṇe prāṇān mitrārthe tyaktavān iha 07,085.050a evaṃ tvām api dharmātman prayāce 'haṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6248: 07,085.050c pṛthivīdānatulyaṃ syād adhikaṃ vā phalaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_07_u:6249: 07,085.051a eka eva sadā kṛṣṇo mitrāṇām abhayaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6250: 07,085.051c raṇe saṃtyajati prāṇān dvitīyas tvaṃ ca sātyake
GE07mbh_07_u:6251: 07,085.052a vikrāntasya ca vīrasya yuddhe prārthayato yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6252: 07,085.052c śūra eva sahāyaḥ syān netaraḥ prākṛto janaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6253: 07,085.053a īdṛśe tu parāmarde vartamānasya mādhava 07,085.053c tvad anyo hi raṇe goptā vijayasya na vidyate 07,085.054a ślāghann eva hi karmāṇi śataśas tava pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6254: 07,085.054c mama saṃjanayan harṣaṃ punaḥ punar akīrtayat
GE07mbh_07_u:6255: 07,085.055a laghvastraś citrayodhī ca tathā laghuparākramaḥ 07,085.055c prājñaḥ sarvāstravic chūro muhyate na ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:6257: 07,085.056c mahābalo mahāvīryaḥ sa mahātmā mahārathaḥ 07,085.057a śiṣyo mama sakhā caiva priyo 'syāhaṃ priyaś ca me
GE07mbh_07_u:6258: 07,085.057c yuyudhānaḥ sahāyo me pramathiṣyati kauravān 07,085.058a asmadarthaṃ ca rājendra saṃnahyed yadi keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6259: 07,085.058c rāmo vāpy aniruddho vā pradyumno vā mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6260: 07,085.059a gado vā sāraṇo vāpi sāmbo vā saha vṛṣṇibhiḥ 07,085.059c sahāyārthaṃ mahārāja
GE07mbh_07_u:6261: 07,085.060a tathāpy ahaṃ naravyāghraṃ śaineyaṃ satyavikramam 07,085.060c sāhāyye viniyokṣyāmi nāsti me 'nyo hi tatsamaḥ 07,085.061a iti dvaitavane tāta mām uvāca dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6262: 07,085.061c parokṣaṃ tvadguṇāṃs tathyān kathayann āryasaṃsadi 07,085.062a tasya tvam evaṃ saṃkalpaṃ na vṛthā kartum arhasi 07,085.062c dhanaṃjayasya vārṣṇeya mama bhīmasya cobhayoḥ 07,085.063a yac cāpi tīrthāni carann agacchaṃ dvārakāṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:6263: 07,085.063c tatrāham api te bhaktim arjunaṃ prati dṛṣṭavān
GE07mbh_07_u:6264: 07,085.064a na tat sauhṛdam anyeṣu mayā śaineya lakṣitam
GE07mbh_07_u:6265: 07,085.064c yathā tvam asmān bhajase vartamānān upaplave
GE07mbh_07_u:6266: 07,085.065a so 'bhijātyā ca bhaktyā ca sakhyasyācāryakasya ca 07,085.065c sauhṛdasya ca vīryasya kulīnatvasya mādhava 07,085.066a satyasya ca mahābāho anukampārtham eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:6267: 07,085.066c anurūpaṃ maheṣvāsa karma tvaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:6268: 07,085.067a soyodhano hi sahasā gato droṇena daṃśitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6269: 07,085.067c pūrvam eva tu yātās te kauravāṇāṃ mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6270: 07,085.068a sumahān ninadaś caiva śrūyate vijayaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:6271: 07,085.068c sa śaineya javenātra gantum arhasi mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:6272: 07,085.069a bhīmaseno vayaṃ caiva saṃyattāḥ sahasainikāḥ 07,085.069c droṇam āvārayiṣyāmo yadi tvāṃ prati yāsyati
GE07mbh_07_u:6273: 07,085.070a paśya śaineya sainyāni dravamāṇāni saṃyuge 07,085.070c mahāntaṃ ca raṇe śabdaṃ dīryamāṇāṃ ca bhāratīm
GE07mbh_07_u:6276: 07,085.072a rathair viparidhāvadbhir manuṣyaiś ca hayaiś ca ha
GE07mbh_07_u:6280: 07,085.074a naitad balam asaṃvārya śakyo hantuṃ jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6281: 07,085.074c ete hi saindhavasyārthe sarve saṃtyaktajīvitāḥ 07,085.075a śaraśaktidhvajavanaṃ hayanāgasamākulam 07,085.075c paśyaitad dhārtarāṣṭrāṇām anīkaṃ sudurāsadam
GE07mbh_07_u:6282: 07,085.076a śṛṇu dundubhinirghoṣaṃ śaṅkhaśabdāṃś ca puṣkalān 07,085.076c siṃhanādaravāṃś caiva rathanemisvanāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:6283: 07,085.077a nāgānāṃ śṛṇu śabdaṃ ca pattīnāṃ ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6284: 07,085.077c sādināṃ dravatāṃ caiva śṛṇu kampayatāṃ mahīm
GE07mbh_07_u:6286: 07,085.078c bahutvād dhi naravyāghra devendram api pīḍayet
GE07mbh_07_u:6287: 07,085.079a aparyante bale magno jahyād api ca jīvitam
GE07mbh_07_u:6288: 07,085.079c tasmiṃś ca nihate yuddhe kathaṃ jīveta mādṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6289: 07,085.079e sarvathāham anuprāptaḥ sukṛcchraṃ bata jīvitam 07,085.080a śyāmo yuvā guḍākeśo darśanīyaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6290: 07,085.080c laghvastraś citrayodhī ca praviṣṭas tāta bhāratīm
GE07mbh_07_u:6292: 07,085.081c tanna jānāmi vārṣṇeya yadi jīvati vā na vā 07,085.081e kurūṇāṃ cāpi tat sainyaṃ sāgarapratimaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:6293: 07,085.082a eka eva ca bībhatsuḥ praviṣṭas tāta bhāratīm
GE07mbh_07_u:6294: 07,085.082c aviṣahyāṃ mahābāhuḥ surair api mahāmṛdhe 07,085.083a na ca me vartate buddhir adya yuddhe kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:6295: 07,085.083c droṇo 'pi rabhaso yuddhe mama pīḍayate balam 07,085.083e pratyakṣaṃ te mahābāho yathāsau carati dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6296: 07,085.084a yugapac ca sametānāṃ kāryāṇāṃ tvaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6297: 07,085.084c mahārthaṃ laghusaṃyuktaṃ kartum arhasi mādhava 07,085.085a tasya me sarvakāryeṣu kāryam etan mataṃ sadā
GE07mbh_07_u:6298: 07,085.085c arjunasya paritrāṇaṃ kartavyam iti saṃyuge 07,085.086a nāhaṃ śocāmi dāśārhaṃ goptāraṃ jagataḥ prabhum
GE07mbh_07_u:6299: 07,085.086c sa hi śakto raṇe tāta trīṃl lokān api saṃgatān
GE07mbh_07_u:6300: 07,085.087a vijetuṃ puruṣavyāghra satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:6301: 07,085.087c kiṃ punar dhārtarāṣṭrasya balam etat sudurbalam
GE07mbh_07_u:6302: 07,085.088a arjunas tv eva vārṣṇeya pīḍito bahubhir yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:6303: 07,085.088c prajahyāt samare prāṇāṃs tasmād vindāmi kaśmalam
GE07mbh_07_u:6304: 07,085.089a tasya tvaṃ padavīṃ gaccha gaccheyus tvādṛśā yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:6306: 07,085.089d*0579_01 tvādṛśās tādṛśaṃ gacches tādṛśaṃ gaccha satyaka
GE07mbh_07_u:6307: 07,085.089d*0580_01 suhṛdo vai suhṛtkṛtye param āsthāya vikramam
GE07mbh_07_u:6308: 07,085.089d*0580_02 suhṛdaḥ padam anvicchan na vyatheta kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:6309: 07,085.090a raṇe vṛṣṇipravīrāṇāṃ dvāv evātirathau smṛtau 07,085.090c pradyumnaś ca mahābāhus tvaṃ ca sātvata viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6311: 07,085.091c vīratāyāṃ naravyāghra dhanaṃjayasamo hy asi 07,085.092a bhīṣmadroṇāv atikramya
GE07mbh_07_u:6312: 07,085.092c tvām adya puruṣavyāghraṃ loke santaḥ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_07_u:6313: 07,085.092d*0581_01 sadevāsuragandharvān sakiṃnaramahoragān 07,085.092d*0581_02 yodhayet sa jagat sarvaṃ vijayeta ripūn bahūn
GE07mbh_07_u:6314: 07,085.092d*0581_03 iti bruvanti lokeṣu janās tava guṇās tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:6315: 07,085.092d*0581_04 samāgameṣu jalpanti pṛthag eva ca sarvadā
GE07mbh_07_u:6316: 07,085.093a nāsādhyaṃ vidyate loke sātyaker iti mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:6317: 07,085.093c tat tvāṃ yad abhivakṣyāmi tat kuruṣva mahābala
GE07mbh_07_u:6318: 07,085.094a saṃbhāvanā hi lokasya tava pārthasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6319: 07,085.094c nānyathā tāṃ mahābāho saṃprakartum ihārhasi 07,085.095a parityajya priyān prāṇān raṇe vicara vīravat
GE07mbh_07_u:6320: 07,085.095c na hi śaineya dāśārhā raṇe rakṣanti jīvitam
GE07mbh_07_u:6321: 07,085.096a ayuddham anavasthānaṃ saṃgrāme ca palāyanam 07,085.096c bhīrūṇām asatāṃ mārgo naiṣa dāśārhasevitaḥ 07,085.097a tavārjuno gurus tāta dharmātmā śinipuṃgava 07,085.097c vāsudevo guruś cāpi tava pārthasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6322: 07,085.098a kāraṇadvayam etad dhi jānānas tvāham abruvam
GE07mbh_07_u:6323: 07,085.098c māvamaṃsthā vaco mahyaṃ gurus tava guror hy aham 07,085.099a vāsudevamataṃ caitan mama caivārjunasya ca 07,085.099c satyam etan mayoktaṃ te yāhi yatra dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6324: 07,085.100a etad vacanam ājñāya mama satyaparākrama 07,085.100c praviśaitad balaṃ tāta dhārtarāṣṭrasya durmateḥ 07,085.101a praviśya ca yathānyāyaṃ saṃgamya ca mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6325: 07,085.101c yathārham ātmanaḥ karma raṇe sātvata darśaya
GE07mbh_07_u:6326: 07,086.001 saṃjaya uvāca 07,086.001a prītiyuktaṃ ca hṛdyaṃ ca madhurākṣaram eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:6327: 07,086.001c kālayuktaṃ ca citraṃ ca svatayā cābhibhāṣitam
GE07mbh_07_u:6328: 07,086.002a dharmarājasya tad vākyaṃ niśamya śinipuṃgavaḥ 07,086.002c sātyakir bharataśreṣṭha pratyuvāca yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_07_u:6329: 07,086.003a śrutaṃ te gadato vākyaṃ sarvam etan mayācyuta
GE07mbh_07_u:6330: 07,086.003c nyāyayuktaṃ ca citraṃ ca phalgunārthe yaśaskaram
GE07mbh_07_u:6331: 07,086.004a evaṃvidhe tathā kāle madṛśaṃ prekṣya saṃmatam
GE07mbh_07_u:6332: 07,086.004c vaktum arhasi rājendra yathā pārthaṃ tathaiva mām
GE07mbh_07_u:6333: 07,086.005a na me dhanaṃjayasyārthe prāṇā rakṣyāḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:6334: 07,086.005c tvatprayuktaḥ punar ahaṃ kiṃ na kuryāṃ mahāhave
GE07mbh_07_u:6336: 07,086.006c tvatprayukto narendreha kim utaitat sudurbalam 07,086.007a suyodhanabalaṃ tv adya yodhayiṣye samantataḥ 07,086.007c vijeṣye ca raṇe rājan satyam etad bravīmi te 07,086.008a kuśaly ahaṃ kuśalinaṃ samāsādya dhanaṃjayam 07,086.008c hate jayadrathe rājan punar eṣyāmi te 'ntikam
GE07mbh_07_u:6337: 07,086.009a avaśyaṃ tu mayā sarvaṃ vijñāpyas tvaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:6338: 07,086.009c vāsudevasya yad vākyaṃ phalgunasya ca dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6339: 07,086.010a dṛḍhaṃ tv abhiparīto 'ham arjunena punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6340: 07,086.010c madhye sarvasya sainyasya vāsudevasya śṛṇvataḥ 07,086.011a adya mādhava rājānam apramatto 'nupālaya
GE07mbh_07_u:6341: 07,086.011c āryāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā yāvad dhanmi jayadratham
GE07mbh_07_u:6342: 07,086.012a tvayi vāhaṃ mahābāho pradyumne vā mahārathe
GE07mbh_07_u:6343: 07,086.012c nṛpaṃ nikṣipya gaccheyaṃ nirapekṣo jayadratham 07,086.012d*0582_01 sa evaṃ vai vinikṣipto nikṣepaḥ savyasācinā
GE07mbh_07_u:6345: 07,086.013a jānīṣe hi raṇe droṇaṃ rabhasaṃ śreṣṭhasaṃmatam
GE07mbh_07_u:6346: 07,086.013c pratijñā cāpi te nityaṃ śrutā droṇasya mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:6348: 07,086.014c śaktaś cāpi raṇe droṇo nigṛhītuṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_07_u:6349: 07,086.015a evaṃ tvayi samādhāya dharmarājaṃ narottamam 07,086.015c aham adya gamiṣyāmi saindhavasya vadhāya hi
GE07mbh_07_u:6350: 07,086.015d*0583_01 sa tvam adya raṇe yatto rakṣa mādhava pāṇḍavam 07,086.015d*0583_02 rakṣaṇe dharmarājasya dhruvo hi vijayo mama
GE07mbh_07_u:6351: 07,086.016a jayadratham ahaṃ hatvā dhruvam eṣyāmi mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:6352: 07,086.016c dharmarājaṃ yathā droṇo nigṛhṇīyād raṇe balāt
GE07mbh_07_u:6354: 07,086.017c saindhavasya vadho na syān mamāprītis tathā bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:6355: 07,086.018a evaṃ gate naraśreṣṭha pāṇḍave satyavādini 07,086.018c asmākaṃ gamanaṃ vyaktaṃ vanaṃ prati bhavet punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6356: 07,086.019a so 'yaṃ mama jayo vyaktaṃ vyartha eva bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:6357: 07,086.019c yadi droṇo raṇe kruddho nigṛhṇīyād yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_07_u:6358: 07,086.020a sa tvam adya mahābāho priyārthaṃ mama mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:6359: 07,086.020c jayārthaṃ ca yaśorthaṃ ca rakṣa rājānam āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:6360: 07,086.021a sa bhavān mayi nikṣepo nikṣiptaḥ savyasācinā
GE07mbh_07_u:6361: 07,086.021c bhāradvājād bhayaṃ nityaṃ paśyamānena te prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:6362: 07,086.022a tasyāpi ca mahābāho nityaṃ paśyati saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:6363: 07,086.022c nānyaṃ hi pratiyoddhāraṃ raukmiṇeyād ṛte prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:6364: 07,086.022e māṃ vāpi manyate yuddhe bhāradvājasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6365: 07,086.022f*0584_01 bhīmo vāpi mahārāja prabhañjanasamo bale 07,086.023a so 'haṃ saṃbhāvanāṃ caitām ācāryavacanaṃ ca tat 07,086.023c pṛṣṭhato notsahe kartuṃ tvāṃ vā tyaktuṃ mahīpate
GE07mbh_07_u:6367: 07,086.024c upalabhya raṇe krīḍed yathā śakuninā śiśuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6368: 07,086.025a yadi kārṣṇir dhanuṣpāṇir iha syān makaradhvajaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6369: 07,086.025c tasmai tvāṃ visṛjeyaṃ vai sa tvāṃ rakṣed yathārjunaḥ 07,086.026a kuru tvam ātmano guptiṃ kas te goptā gate mayi
GE07mbh_07_u:6370: 07,086.026c yaḥ pratīyād raṇe droṇaṃ yāvad gacchāmi pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:6371: 07,086.027a mā ca te bhayam adyāstu rājann arjunasaṃbhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:6372: 07,086.027c na sa jātu mahābāhur bhāram udyamya sīdati
GE07mbh_07_u:6373: 07,086.028a ye ca sauvīrakā yodhās tathā saindhavapauravāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6374: 07,086.028c udīcyā dākṣiṇātyāś ca ye cānye 'pi mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6375: 07,086.029a ye ca karṇamukhā rājan rathodārāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:6410: 07,086.048a yatra sthāsyati saṃgrāme pārṣataḥ paravīrahā 07,086.048c na droṇasainyaṃ balavat krāmet tatra kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:6412: 07,086.049c kavacī sa śarī khaḍgī dhanvī ca varabhūṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6413: 07,086.049d*0588_01 eṣa droṇaṃ raṇe kruddhaṃ vārayeta sa vai prabho 07,086.049d*0588_02 pāñcālaḥ sahitaḥ sarvaiḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca dhanvibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6414: 07,086.050a viśrabdho gaccha śaineya mā kārṣīr mayi saṃbhramam
GE07mbh_07_u:6415: 07,086.050c dhṛṣṭadyumno raṇe kruddho droṇam āvārayiṣyati 07,087.001 saṃjaya uvāca 07,087.001a dharmarājasya tad vākyaṃ niśamya śinipuṃgavaḥ 07,087.001c pārthāc ca bhayam āśaṅkan parityāgān mahīpateḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:6417: 07,087.002c na māṃ bhīta iti brūyur āyāntaṃ phalgunaṃ prati 07,087.003a niścitya bahudhaivaṃ sa sātyakir yuddhadurmadaḥ 07,087.003b*0589_01 nātivyaktam ivābhāṣya dharmarājaṃ mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6419: 07,087.003c dharmarājam idaṃ vākyam abravīt puruṣarṣabha 07,087.003d*0590_01 yathedānīm iti dhyātvā dharmarājam athābravīt 07,087.004a kṛtāṃ cen manyase rakṣāṃ svasti te 'stu viśāṃ pate 07,087.004c anuyāsyāmi bībhatsuṃ kariṣye vacanaṃ tava 07,087.005a na hi me pāṇḍavāt kaś cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate

GE07mbh_07_u:6423: 07,087.008a priye hi tava vartete bhrātarau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_07_u:6424: 07,087.008c tayoḥ priye sthitaṃ caiva viddhi māṃ rājapuṃgava
GE07mbh_07_u:6425: 07,087.009a tavājñāṃ śirasā gṛhya pāṇḍavārtham ahaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:6426: 07,087.009c bhittvedaṃ durbhidaṃ sainyaṃ prayāsye narasattama 07,087.010a droṇānīkaṃ viśāmy eṣa kruddho jhaṣa ivārṇavam
GE07mbh_07_u:6427: 07,087.010c tatra yāsyāmi yatrāsau rājan rājā jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6428: 07,087.011a yatra senāṃ samāśritya bhītas tiṣṭhati pāṇḍavāt
GE07mbh_07_u:6430: 07,087.012a itas triyojanaṃ manye tam adhvānaṃ viśāṃ pate

GE07mbh_07_u:6435: 07,087.014f*0591_01 yatra tiṣṭhati rājāsau saindhavo bālaghātakaḥ 07,087.014f*0591_02 sāgarapratimaṃ sainyaṃ garjantam iva sāgaram 07,087.015a huḍaśaktigadāprāsakhaḍgacarmarṣṭitomaram
GE07mbh_07_u:6437: 07,087.016a yad etat kuñjarānīkaṃ sāhasram anupaśyasi 07,087.016c kulam añjanakaṃ nāma yatraite vīryaśālinaḥ 07,087.017a āsthitā bahubhir mlecchair yuddhaśauṇḍaiḥ prahāribhiḥ 07,087.017c nāgā meghanibhā rājan kṣaranta iva toyadāḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:6439: 07,087.019a atha yān rathino rājan samantād anupaśyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:6440: 07,087.019c ete rukmarathā nāma rājaputrā mahārathāḥ 07,087.020a ratheṣv astreṣu nipuṇā nāgeṣu ca viśāṃ pate

GE07mbh_07_u:6444: 07,087.022a śūrāś ca kṛtavidyāś ca spardhante ca parasparam
GE07mbh_07_u:6445: 07,087.022c nityaṃ ca samare rājan vijigīṣanti mānavān
GE07mbh_07_u:6446: 07,087.023a karṇena vijitā rājan duḥśāsanam anuvratāḥ 07,087.023c etāṃs tu vāsudevo 'pi rathodārān praśaṃsati 07,087.024a satataṃ priyakāmāś ca karṇasyaite vaśe sthitāḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:6448: 07,087.025c madarthaṃ viṣṭhitā nūnaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya śāsanāt 07,087.026a etān pramathya saṃgrāme priyārthaṃ tava kaurava

GE07mbh_07_u:6450: 07,087.028a kirātarājo yān prādād gṛhītaḥ savyasācinā 07,087.028c svalaṃkṛtāṃs tathā preṣyān icchañ jīvitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6451: 07,087.029a āsann ete purā rājaṃs tava karmakarā dṛḍham
GE07mbh_07_u:6452: 07,087.029c tvām evādya yuyutsante paśya kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_07_u:6453: 07,087.030a teṣām ete mahāmātrāḥ kirātā yuddhadurmadāḥ 07,087.030c hastiśikṣāvidaś caiva sarve caivāgniyonayaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:6457: 07,087.033c karkaśāś ca vinītāś ca prabhinnakaraṭāmukhāḥ 07,087.034a jāmbūnadamayaiḥ sarvair varmabhiḥ suvibhūṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6458: 07,087.034c labdhalakṣyā raṇe rājann airāvaṇasamā yudhi 07,087.035a uttarāt parvatād ete tīkṣṇair dasyubhir āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6459: 07,087.035b*0592_01 āsthitā dasyubhis tīkṣṇaiḥ śūrair uttamapārvataiḥ 07,087.035c karkaśaiḥ pravarair yodhaiḥ kārṣṇāyasatanucchadaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6460: 07,087.036a santi goyonayaś cātra santi vānarayonayaḥ 07,087.036c anekayonayaś cānye tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:6461: 07,087.037a anīkam asatām etad dhūmavarṇam udīryate 07,087.037c mlecchānāṃ pāpakartṝṇāṃ
GE07mbh_07_u:6462: 07,087.038a etad duryodhano labdhvā samagraṃ nāgamaṇḍalam 07,087.038c kṛpaṃ ca saumadattiṃ ca droṇaṃ ca rathināṃ varam 07,087.039a sindhurājaṃ tathā karṇam avamanyata pāṇḍavān 07,087.039b*0593_01 bhīṣmaṃ droṇaṃ kṛpaṃ karṇam āvantyāv atha saindhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:6463: 07,087.039b*0593_02 drauṇiṃ ca saumadattiṃ ca pāṇḍavān atimanyate
GE07mbh_07_u:6464: 07,087.039c kṛtārtham atha cātmānaṃ manyate kālacoditaḥ 07,087.040a te ca sarve 'nusaṃprāptā mama nārācagocaram 07,087.040c na vimokṣyanti kaunteya yady api syur manojavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6467: 07,087.042a ye tv ete rathino rājan dṛśyante kāñcanadhvajāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6468: 07,087.042c ete durvāraṇā nāma kāmbojā yadi te śrutāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6469: 07,087.043a śūrāś ca kṛtavidyāś ca dhanurvede ca niṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6470: 07,087.043c saṃhatāś ca bhṛśaṃ hy ete anyonyasya hitaiṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6471: 07,087.044a akṣauhiṇyaś ca saṃrabdhā dhārtarāṣṭrasya bhārata 07,087.044c yattā madarthaṃ tiṣṭhanti kuruvīrābhirakṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6472: 07,087.045a apramattā mahārāja mām eva pratyupasthitāḥ 07,087.045c tāṃs tv ahaṃ pramathiṣyāmi tṛṇānīva hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6473: 07,087.046a tasmāt sarvān upāsaṅgān sarvopakaraṇāni ca 07,087.046c rathe kurvantu me rājan yathāvad rathakalpakāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6474: 07,087.047a asmiṃs tu khalu saṃgrāme grāhyaṃ vividham āyudham

GE07mbh_07_u:6481: 07,087.052a tasmād vai vājino mukhyā viśrāntāḥ śubhalakṣaṇāḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:6502: 07,087.065d*0596_01 yathā śakrarathaṃ rājann ūhus te harayaḥ purā

GE07mbh_07_u:6504: 07,087.065d*0596_05 saṃyattās tāvakāḥ sarve tasthur droṇapurogamāḥ 07,087.065d*0596_06 saṃnaddham anugacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmaṃ sa sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6505: 07,087.065d*0596_07 abhinandyābravīd vīras tadā harṣakaraṃ vacaḥ 07,087.066a atha harṣaparītāṅgaḥ sātyakir bhīmam abravīt 07,087.066c tvaṃ bhīma rakṣa rājānam etat kāryatamaṃ hi te 07,087.067a ahaṃ bhittvā pravekṣyāmi kālapakvam idaṃ balam
GE07mbh_07_u:6506: 07,087.067c āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca śreyo rājño 'bhirakṣaṇam

GE07mbh_07_u:9020: 07,119.001 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 07,119.001*0980_01 śaineyasya ca votpattir bhūriśravasam eva

GE07mbh_07_u:9035: 07,119.010a tatra vai devakīṃ devīṃ vasudevārtham āptavān
GE07mbh_07_u:9036: 07,119.010c nirjitya pārthivān sarvān ratham āropayac chiniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9037: 07,119.011a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā devakīṃ śaure rathasthāṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9038: 07,119.011b*0985_01 tāṃ dṛṣṭvā nīyamānāṃ tu vasudevāya devakīm
GE07mbh_07_u:9039: 07,119.011c nāmṛṣyata mahātejāḥ somadattaḥ śiner nṛpa 07,119.012a tayor yuddham abhūd rājan dinārdhaṃ citram adbhutam
GE07mbh_07_u:9041: 07,119.013a śininā somadattas tu prasahya bhuvi pātitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9042: 07,119.013c asim udyamya keśeṣu pragṛhya ca padā hataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9044: 07,119.014c kṛpayā ca punas tena jīveti sa visarjitaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:9049: 07,119.017c madhye rājasahasrāṇāṃ padā hanyāc ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:9050: 07,119.018a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā somadattasya pārthiva
GE07mbh_07_u:9051: 07,119.018b*0986_01 sa śiraḥkampam āhedaṃ naitad evaṃ bhaven nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:9052: 07,119.018b*0986_02 sa pūrvam eva tapasā mām ārādhya jagattraye
GE07mbh_07_u:9053: 07,119.018b*0986_03 kasyāpy ajayyas tan mattaḥ prāptavān varam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:9054: 07,119.018b*0986_04 tathāpy ayaṃ prayāsas tu niṣphalo na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:9055: 07,119.018b*0986_05 tasya pautraṃ tu samare tvatputro mohayiṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:9056: 07,119.018b*0986_06 na tu mārayituṃ śakyaḥ kṛṣṇasaṃrakṣito hy asau
GE07mbh_07_u:9057: 07,119.018b*0986_07 aham eva ca kṛṣṇo 'smi nāvayor antaraṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_07_u:9058: 07,119.018c evam astv iti tatroktvā sa devo 'ntaradhīyata
GE07mbh_07_u:9060: 07,119.019a sa tena varadānena labdhavān bhūridakṣiṇam 07,119.019c nyapātayac ca samare saumadattiḥ śineḥ sutam
GE07mbh_07_u:9061: 07,119.019d*0988_01 paśyatāṃ sarvasainyānāṃ padā cainam atāḍayat 07,119.020a etat te kathitaṃ rājan yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi 07,119.020c na hi śakyā raṇe jetuṃ sātvatā manujarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:9062: 07,119.021a labdhalakṣyāś ca saṃgrāme bahavaś citrayodhinaḥ 07,119.021c devadānavagandharvān vijetāro hy avismitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9064: 07,119.022a na tulyaṃ vṛṣṇibhir iha dṛśyate kiṃ cana prabho 07,119.022c bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca balena bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:9065: 07,119.023a na jñātim avamanyante vṛddhānāṃ śāsane ratāḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:9069: 07,119.024c eteṣāṃ rakṣitāraś ca ye syuḥ kasyāṃ cid āpadi 07,119.025a arthavanto na cotsiktā brahmaṇyāḥ satyavādinaḥ 07,119.025c samarthān nāvamanyante dīnān abhyuddharanti ca 07,119.026a nityaṃ devaparā dāntā dātāraś cāvikatthanāḥ 07,119.026c tena vṛṣṇipravīrāṇāṃ cakraṃ na pratihanyate 07,119.027a api meruṃ vahet kaś cit tared vā makarālayam 07,119.027c na tu vṛṣṇipravīrāṇāṃ sametyāntaṃ vrajen nṛpa

GE07mbh_07_u:9072: 07,120.001 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 07,120.001a tadavasthe hate tasmin bhūriśravasi kaurave 07,120.001c yathā bhūyo 'bhavad yuddhaṃ tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:9073: 07,120.002 saṃjaya uvāca 07,120.002a bhūriśravasi saṃkrānte paralokāya bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:9075: 07,120.003a codayāśvān bhṛśaṃ kṛṣṇa yato rājā jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9076: 07,120.003b*0990_01 pratijñāṃ saphalāṃ cāpi kartum arhasi me 'nagha
GE07mbh_07_u:9077: 07,120.003b*0991_01 śrūyate puṇḍarīkākṣa triṣu dharmeṣu vartate 07,120.003c astam eti mahābāho tvaramāṇo divākaraḥ 07,120.004a etad dhi puruṣavyāghra mahad abhyudyataṃ mayā
GE07mbh_07_u:9079: 07,120.005a nāstam eti yathā sūryo yathā satyaṃ bhaved vacaḥ 07,120.005c codayāśvāṃs tathā kṛṣṇa yathā hanyāṃ jayadratham
GE07mbh_07_u:9080: 07,120.005d*0992_00 saṃjaya uvāca 07,120.005d*0992_01 jayadrathavadhe prāpte tāv ubhau kurupāṇḍavau 07,120.005d*0992_02 sasmitau samudekṣetāṃ prauḍhā bālā vadhūr iva
GE07mbh_07_u:9081: 07,120.006a tataḥ kṛṣṇo mahābāhū rajatapratimān hayān 07,120.006c hayajñaś codayām āsa jayadratharathaṃ prati 07,120.007a taṃ prayāntam amogheṣum utpatadbhir ivāśugaiḥ 07,120.007c tvaramāṇā mahārāja senāmukhyāḥ samāvrajan
GE07mbh_07_u:9082: 07,120.008a duryodhanaś ca karṇaś ca vṛṣaseno 'tha madrarāṭ
GE07mbh_07_u:9083: 07,120.008c aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva svayam eva ca saindhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9084: 07,120.009a samāsādya tu bībhatsuḥ saindhavaṃ pramukhe sthitam

GE07mbh_07_u:9087: 07,120.010b*0993_02 satyakaṃ bhīmasenaṃ ca yattau tau darśayann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:9088: 07,120.010c arjunaṃ vīkṣya saṃyāntaṃ jayadratharathaṃ prati 07,120.010d*0994_01 uvāca rājan putras te karṇaṃ rājā suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9089: 07,120.011a ayaṃ sa vaikartana yuddhakālo; vidarśayasvātmabalaṃ mahātman 07,120.011c yathā na vadhyeta raṇe 'rjunena; jayadrathaḥ karṇa tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:9091: 07,120.012a alpāvaśiṣṭaṃ divasaṃ nṛvīra; vighātayasvādya ripuṃ śaraughaiḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:9097: 07,120.015c vasuṃdharām imāṃ karṇa bhokṣyāmo hatakaṇṭakām 07,120.016a daivenopahataḥ pārtho viparītaś ca mānada 07,120.016c kāryākāryam ajānan vai pratijñāṃ kṛtavān raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:9099: 07,120.017c pratijñeyaṃ kṛtā karṇa jayadrathavadhaṃ prati 07,120.018a kathaṃ jīvati durdharṣe tvayi rādheya phalgunaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:9102: 07,120.021c śaṅke jayadrathaṃ pārtho naiva prāpsyati mānada

GE07mbh_07_u:9104: 07,120.022c yudhyasva yatnam āsthāya paraṃ pārthena saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:9105: 07,120.023a evam uktas tu rādheyas tava putreṇa māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:9106: 07,120.023c duryodhanam idaṃ vākyaṃ pratyuvāca kurūttamam 07,120.024a dṛḍhalakṣyeṇa śūreṇa bhīmasenena dhanvinā

GE07mbh_07_u:9108: 07,120.025c naivāṅgam iṅgati kiṃ cin me saṃtaptasya raṇeṣubhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9109: 07,120.026a yotsyāmi tu tathā rājañ śaktyāhaṃ parayā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:9110: 07,120.026b*0996_01 tad yathā prayatiṣye 'haṃ paraṃ śaktyā suyodhana
GE07mbh_07_u:9112: 07,120.027a na hi me yudhyamānasya sāyakāṃś cāsyataḥ śitān
GE07mbh_07_u:9113: 07,120.027c saindhavaṃ prāpsyate vīraḥ savyasācī dhanaṃjayaḥ 07,120.028a yat tu śaktimatā kāryaṃ satataṃ hitakāriṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:9114: 07,120.028c tat kariṣyāmi kauravya jayo daive pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9115: 07,120.028d*0997_01 saindhavārthe paraṃ yatnaṃ kariṣyāmy adya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:9116: 07,120.028d*0997_02 tvatpriyārthaṃ mahārāja jayo daive pratiṣṭhitaḥ 07,120.029a adya yotsye 'rjunam ahaṃ pauruṣaṃ svaṃ vyapāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9117: 07,120.029c tvadarthaṃ puruṣavyāghra jayo daive pratiṣṭhitaḥ 07,120.030a adya yuddhaṃ kuruśreṣṭha mama pārthasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9120: 07,120.031c arjuno niśitair bāṇair jaghāna tava vāhinīm

GE07mbh_07_u:9125: 07,120.034c kṣuraiś ciccheda bībhatsur dvidhaikaikaṃ tridhaiva ca

GE07mbh_07_u:9129: 07,120.036c acireṇa mahīṃ pārthaś cakāra rudhirottarām 07,120.037a hatabhūyiṣṭhayodhaṃ tat kṛtvā tava balaṃ balī
GE07mbh_07_u:9131: 07,120.038a bībhatsur bhīmasenena sātvatena ca rakṣitaḥ 07,120.038c sa babhau bharataśreṣṭha jvalann iva hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9132: 07,120.039a taṃ tathāvasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tvadīyā vīryasaṃmatāḥ 07,120.039c nāmṛṣyanta maheṣvāsāḥ phalgunaṃ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9133: 07,120.040a duryodhanaś ca karṇaś ca vṛṣaseno 'tha madrarāṭ
GE07mbh_07_u:9134: 07,120.040c aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva svayam eva ca saindhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9141: 07,120.044a te bhujair bhogibhogābhair dhanūṃṣy āyamya sāyakān
GE07mbh_07_u:9142: 07,120.044c mumucuḥ sūryaraśmyābhāñ śataśaḥ phalgunaṃ prati 07,120.045a tān astān asyamānāṃś ca kirīṭī yuddhadurmadaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9143: 07,120.045c dvidhā tridhāṣṭadhaikaikaṃ chittvā vivyādha tān raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:9144: 07,120.046a siṃhalāṅgūlaketus tu darśayañ śaktim ātmanaḥ 07,120.046c śāradvatīsuto rājann arjunaṃ pratyavārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:9145: 07,120.047a sa viddhvā daśabhiḥ pārthaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9147: 07,120.048a athainaṃ kauravaśreṣṭhāḥ sarva eva mahārathāḥ 07,120.048c mahatā rathavaṃśena sarvataḥ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:9148: 07,120.049a visphārayantaś cāpāni visṛjantaś ca sāyakān 07,120.049c saindhavaṃ paryarakṣanta śāsanāt tanayasya te 07,120.050a tatra pārthasya śūrasya bāhvor balam adṛśyata

GE07mbh_07_u:10505: 07,133.026a doṣam atra na paśyāmi śūrāṇāṃ raṇamūrdhani

GE07mbh_07_u:10509: 07,133.028c garjāmi yady ahaṃ vipra tava kiṃ tatra naśyati 07,133.029a vṛthā śūrā na garjanti sajalā iva toyadāḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:10689: 07,134.076c vayaṃ śeṣān haniṣyāmas tvayaiva parirakṣitāḥ 07,134.077a ete hi somakā vipra pāñcālāś ca yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10690: 07,134.077c mama sainyeṣu saṃrabdhā vicaranti davāgnivat 07,134.078a tān vāraya mahābāho kekayāṃś ca narottama
GE07mbh_07_u:10691: 07,134.078c purā kurvanti niḥśeṣaṃ rakṣyamāṇāḥ kirīṭinā 07,134.078d*1152_01 aśvatthāmaṃs tvarāyukto yāhi śīghram ariṃdama 07,134.079a ādau vā yadi vā paścāt tavedaṃ karma māriṣa 07,134.079c tvam utpanno mahābāho pāñcālānāṃ vadhaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:10692: 07,134.080a kariṣyasi jagat sarvam apāñcālaṃ kilācyuta 07,134.080c evaṃ siddhābruvan vāco bhaviṣyati ca tat tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:10693: 07,134.080d*1153_01 tasmāt tvaṃ puruṣavyāghra pāñcālāñ jahi sānugān
GE07mbh_07_u:10694: 07,134.081a na te 'stragocare śaktāḥ sthātuṃ devāḥ savāsavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10695: 07,134.081c kim u pārthāḥ sapāñcālāḥ satyam etad vaco mama 07,134.081d*1154_01 na tvāṃ samarthāḥ saṃgrāme pāṇḍavāḥ saha somakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10696: 07,134.081d*1154_02 balād yodhayituṃ vīra satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:10697: 07,134.081d*1154_03 gaccha gaccha mahābāho na naḥ kālātyayo bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:10698: 07,134.081d*1154_04 iyaṃ hi dravate senā pārthasāyakapīḍitā 07,134.081d*1154_05 śakto hy asi mahābāho divyena svena tejasā
GE07mbh_07_u:10699: 07,134.081d*1154_06 nigrahe pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ pāñcālānāṃ ca mānada 07,135.001 saṃjaya uvāca 07,135.001a duryodhanenaivam ukto drauṇir āhavadurmadaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10700: 07,135.001b*1155_01 cakārārivadhe yatnam indro daityavadhe yathā 07,135.001c pratyuvāca mahābāho yathā vadasi kaurava 07,135.001c*1156_01 **** **** tava putram idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10702: 07,135.002a priyā hi pāṇḍavā nityaṃ mama cāpi pituś ca me
GE07mbh_07_u:10703: 07,135.002c tathaivāvāṃ priyau teṣāṃ na tu yuddhe kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_07_u:10704: 07,135.002e śaktitas tāta yudhyāmas tyaktvā prāṇān abhītavat
GE07mbh_07_u:10705: 07,135.003a ahaṃ karṇaś ca śalyaś ca kṛpo hārdikya eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:10706: 07,135.003c nimeṣāt pāṇḍavīṃ senāṃ kṣapayema nṛpottama 07,135.004a te cāpi kauravīṃ senāṃ nimeṣārdhāt kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_07_u:10707: 07,135.004c kṣapayeyur mahābāho na syāma yadi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:10708: 07,135.005a yudhyatāṃ pāṇḍavāñ śaktyā teṣāṃ cāsmān yuyutsatām
GE07mbh_07_u:10709: 07,135.005c tejas tu teja āsādya praśamaṃ yāti bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:10710: 07,135.006a aśakyā tarasā jetuṃ pāṇḍavānām anīkinī 07,135.006c jīvatsu pāṇḍuputreṣu tad dhi satyaṃ bravīmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:10711: 07,135.007a ātmārthaṃ yudhyamānās te samarthāḥ pāṇḍunandanāḥ 07,135.007c kimarthaṃ tava sainyāni na haniṣyanti bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:10712: 07,135.008a tvaṃ hi lubdhatamo rājan nikṛtijñaś ca kaurava
GE07mbh_07_u:10714: 07,135.008d*1157_01 manye tvaṃ kutsito rājan pāpātmā pāpapūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10715: 07,135.008d*1157_02 anyān api sa naḥ kṣudra śaṅkase pāpabhāvitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10716: 07,135.009a ahaṃ tu yatnam āsthāya tvadarthe tyaktajīvitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10717: 07,135.009c eṣa gacchāmi saṃgrāmaṃ tvatkṛte kurunandana 07,135.010a yotsye 'haṃ śatrubhiḥ sārdhaṃ jeṣyāmi ca varān varān
GE07mbh_07_u:10718: 07,135.010c pāñcālaiḥ saha yotsyāmi somakaiḥ kekayais tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:10719: 07,135.010e pāṇḍaveyaiś ca saṃgrāme tvatpriyārtham ariṃdama 07,135.011a adya madbāṇanirdagdhāḥ pāñcālāḥ somakās tathā 07,135.011c siṃhenevārditā gāvo vidraviṣyanti sarvataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10720: 07,135.012a adya dharmasuto rājā dṛṣṭvā mama parākramam
GE07mbh_07_u:10721: 07,135.012c aśvatthāmamayaṃ lokaṃ maṃsyate saha somakaiḥ 07,135.013a āgamiṣyati nirvedaṃ dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10722: 07,135.013c dṛṣṭvā vinihatān saṃkhye pāñcālān somakaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:10723: 07,135.014a ye māṃ yuddhe 'bhiyotsyanti tān haniṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:10724: 07,135.014c na hi te vīra mucyeran madbāhvantaram āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10725: 07,135.015a evam uktvā mahābāhuḥ putraṃ duryodhanaṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:10727: 07,135.015e cikīrṣus tava putrāṇāṃ priyaṃ prāṇabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10729: 07,135.016c praharadhvam itaḥ sarve mama gātre mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10731: 07,135.017a evam uktās tu te sarve śastravṛṣṭim apātayan
GE07mbh_07_u:10732: 07,135.017c drauṇiṃ prati mahārāja jalaṃ jaladharā iva
GE07mbh_07_u:10733: 07,135.018a tān nihatya śarān drauṇir daśa vīrān apothayat
GE07mbh_07_u:10735: 07,135.019a te hanyamānāḥ samare pāñcālāḥ sṛñjayās tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:10736: 07,135.019c parityajya raṇe drauṇiṃ vyadravanta diśo daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:10737: 07,135.020a tān dṛṣṭvā dravataḥ śūrān pāñcālān sahasomakān
GE07mbh_07_u:10738: 07,135.020c dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārāja drauṇim abhyadravad yudhi 07,135.021a tataḥ kāñcanacitrāṇāṃ
GE07mbh_07_u:10739: 07,135.021c vṛtaḥ śatena śūrāṇāṃ rathānām anivartinām 07,135.022a putraḥ pāñcālarājasya dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10740: 07,135.022c drauṇim ity abravīd vākyaṃ dṛṣṭvā yodhān nipātitān
GE07mbh_07_u:10741: 07,135.023a ācāryaputra durbuddhe kim anyair nihatais tava
GE07mbh_07_u:10742: 07,135.023c samāgaccha mayā sārdhaṃ yadi śūro 'si saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:10743: 07,135.023e ahaṃ tvāṃ nihaniṣyāmi tiṣṭhedānīṃ mamāgrataḥ 07,135.024a tatas tam ācāryasutaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pratāpavān 07,135.024c marmabhidbhiḥ śarais tīkṣṇair jaghāna bharatarṣabha 07,135.025a te tu paṅktīkṛtā drauṇiṃ śarā viviśur āśugāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10745: 07,135.025e madhvarthina ivoddāmā bhramarāḥ puṣpitaṃ drumam 07,135.026a so 'tividdho bhṛśaṃ kruddhaḥ padākrānta ivoragaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10746: 07,135.026c mānī drauṇir asaṃbhrānto bāṇapāṇir abhāṣata 07,135.027a dhṛṣṭadyumna sthiro bhūtvā muhūrtaṃ pratipālaya 07,135.027c yāvat tvāṃ niśitair bāṇaiḥ preṣayāmi yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_07_u:10747: 07,135.028a drauṇir evam athābhāṣya pārṣataṃ paravīrahā 07,135.028c chādayām āsa bāṇaughaiḥ samantāl laghuhastavat 07,135.029a sa chādyamānaḥ samare drauṇinā yuddhadurmadaḥ 07,135.029c drauṇiṃ pāñcālatanayo vāgbhir ātarjayat tadā 07,135.030a na jānīṣe pratijñāṃ me viprotpattiṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:10748: 07,135.030c droṇaṃ hatvā kila mayā hantavyas tvaṃ sudurmate
GE07mbh_07_u:10749: 07,135.030e tatas tvāhaṃ na hanmy adya droṇe jīvati saṃyuge 07,135.031a imāṃ tu rajanīṃ prāptām aprabhātāṃ sudurmate
GE07mbh_07_u:10750: 07,135.031c nihatya pitaraṃ te 'dya tatas tvām api saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:10751: 07,135.031e neṣyāmi mṛtyulokāyety evaṃ me manasi sthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:10752: 07,135.032a yas te pārtheṣu vidveṣo yā bhaktiḥ kauraveṣu ca 07,135.032c tāṃ darśaya sthiro bhūtvā na me jīvan vimokṣyase 07,135.033a yo hi brāhmaṇyam utsṛjya kṣatradharmarato dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10753: 07,135.033c sa vadhyaḥ sarvalokasya yathā tvaṃ puruṣādhama
GE07mbh_07_u:10754: 07,135.034a ity uktaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ pārṣatena dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10755: 07,135.034c krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:10757: 07,135.035c chādayām āsa ca śarair niḥśvasan pannago yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:10758: 07,135.036a sa chādyamānaḥ samare drauṇinā rājasattama 07,135.036c sarvapāñcālasenābhiḥ saṃvṛto rathasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10760: 07,135.037c sāyakāṃś caiva vividhān aśvatthāmni mumoca ha
GE07mbh_07_u:10761: 07,135.038a tau punaḥ saṃnyavartetāṃ prāṇadyūtapare raṇe 07,135.038c nivārayantau bāṇaughaiḥ parasparam amarṣiṇau
GE07mbh_07_u:10765: 07,135.040a śaraughaiḥ pūrayantau tāv ākāśaṃ pradiśas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:10766: 07,135.040c alakṣyau samayudhyetāṃ mahat kṛtvā śarais tamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10769: 07,135.042a ayudhyetāṃ mahābāhū citraṃ laghu ca suṣṭhu ca
GE07mbh_07_u:10771: 07,135.043a tau prayuddhau raṇe dṛṣṭvā vane vanyau gajāv iva 07,135.043c ubhayoḥ senayor harṣas tumulaḥ samapadyata 07,135.044a siṃhanādaravāś cāsan dadhmuḥ śaṅkhāṃś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:10773: 07,135.045a tasmiṃs tu tumule yuddhe bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhane
GE07mbh_07_u:10774: 07,135.045c muhūrtam iva tad yuddhaṃ samarūpaṃ tadābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:10775: 07,135.046a tato drauṇir mahārāja pārṣatasya mahātmanaḥ 07,135.046c dhvajaṃ dhanus tathā chatram ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_07_u:10776: 07,135.046e sūtam aśvāṃś ca caturo nihatyābhyadravad raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:10777: 07,135.047a pāñcālāṃś caiva tān sarvān bāṇaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10779: 07,135.048a tataḥ pravivyathe senā pāṇḍavī bharatarṣabha 07,135.048c dṛṣṭvā drauṇer mahat karma vāsavasyeva saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:10780: 07,135.049a śatena ca śataṃ hatvā pāñcālānāṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10781: 07,135.049c tribhiś ca niśitair bāṇair hatvā trīn vai mahārathān 07,135.050a drauṇir drupadaputrasya phalgunasya ca paśyataḥ 07,135.050c nāśayām āsa pāñcālān bhūyiṣṭhaṃ ye vyavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10782: 07,135.051a te vadhyamānāḥ pāñcālāḥ samare saha sṛñjayaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10784: 07,135.052a sa jitvā samare śatrūn droṇaputro mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10785: 07,135.052c nanāda sumahānādaṃ tapānte jalado yathā 07,135.053a sa nihatya bahūñ śūrān aśvatthāmā vyarocata
GE07mbh_07_u:10786: 07,135.053c yugānte sarvabhūtāni bhasma kṛtveva pāvakaḥ 07,135.054a saṃpūjyamāno yudhi kauraveyair; vijitya saṃkhye 'rigaṇān
GE07mbh_07_u:10790: 07,136.001 saṃjaya uvāca 07,136.001a tato yudhiṣṭhiraś caiva bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10792: 07,136.002a tato duryodhano rājā bhāradvājena saṃvṛtaḥ 07,136.002c abhyayāt pāṇḍavān saṃkhye tato yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_07_u:10794: 07,136.003a ambaṣṭhān mālavān vaṅgāñ śibīṃs traigartakān api
GE07mbh_07_u:10795: 07,136.003c prāhiṇon mṛtyulokāya gaṇān kruddho yudhiṣṭhiraḥ 07,136.004a abhīṣāhāñ śūrasenān kṣatriyān yuddhadurmadān
GE07mbh_07_u:10796: 07,136.004c nikṛtya pṛthivīṃ cakre bhīmaḥ śoṇitakardamām 07,136.005a yaudheyāraṭṭarājanyān madrakāṃś ca gaṇān yudhi 07,136.005c prāhiṇon mṛtyulokāya kirīṭī niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ 07,136.006a pragāḍham añjogatibhir nārācair abhipīḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10797: 07,136.006c nipetur dviradā bhūmau dviśṛṅgā iva parvatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10798: 07,136.007a nikṛttair hastihastaiś ca luṭhamānais tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10799: 07,136.007c rarāja vasudhā kīrṇā visarpadbhir ivoragaiḥ 07,136.008a kṣiptaiḥ kanakacitraiś ca nṛpacchatraiḥ kṣitir babhau
GE07mbh_07_u:10800: 07,136.008c dyaur ivādityacandrādyair grahaiḥ kīrṇā yugakṣaye 07,136.009a hata praharatābhītā vidhyata vyavakṛntata
GE07mbh_07_u:10801: 07,136.009c ity āsīt tumulaḥ śabdaḥ śoṇāśvasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:10802: 07,136.010a droṇas tu paramakruddho vāyavyāstreṇa saṃyuge 07,136.010c vyadhamat tān yathā vāyur meghān iva duratyayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10803: 07,136.011a te hanyamānā droṇena pāñcālāḥ prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:10804: 07,136.011c paśyato bhīmasenasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥ 07,136.012a tataḥ kirīṭī bhīmaś ca sahasā saṃnyavartatām
GE07mbh_07_u:10805: 07,136.012c mahatā rathavaṃśena parigṛhya balaṃ tava 07,136.013a bībhatsur dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvam uttaraṃ tu vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10807: 07,136.014a tau tadā sṛñjayāś caiva pāñcālāś ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10808: 07,136.014c anvagacchan mahārāja matsyāś ca saha somakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10809: 07,136.015a tathaiva tava putrasya rathodārāḥ prahāriṇaḥ 07,136.015c mahatyā senayā sārdhaṃ jagmur droṇarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:10810: 07,136.016a tataḥ sā bharatī senā vadhyamānā kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_07_u:10811: 07,136.016c tamasā nidrayā caiva punar eva vyadīryata
GE07mbh_07_u:10812: 07,136.017a droṇena vāryamāṇās te svayaṃ tava sutena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:10813: 07,136.017c na śakyante mahārāja yodhā vārayituṃ tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:10814: 07,136.018a sā pāṇḍuputrasya śarair dāryamāṇā mahācamūḥ 07,136.018c tamasā saṃvṛte loke vyadravat sarvatomukhī 07,136.019a utsṛjya śataśo vāhāṃs tatra ke cin narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10816: 07,137.001 saṃjaya uvāca 07,137.001a somadattaṃ tu saṃprekṣya vidhunvānaṃ mahad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10817: 07,137.001c sātyakiḥ prāha yantāraṃ somadattāya māṃ vaha
GE07mbh_07_u:10818: 07,137.002a na hy ahatvā raṇe śatruṃ bāhlīkaṃ kauravādhamam
GE07mbh_07_u:10819: 07,137.002c nivartiṣye raṇāt sūta satyam etad vaco mama
GE07mbh_07_u:10820: 07,137.003a tataḥ saṃpreṣayad yantā saindhavāṃs tān mahājavān
GE07mbh_07_u:10823: 07,137.004c yathendraṃ harayo rājan purā daityavadhodyatam 07,137.005a tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya sātvataṃ rabhasaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:10825: 07,137.006a vimuñcañ śaravarṣāṇi parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān 07,137.006c chādayām āsa śaineyaṃ jalado bhāskaraṃ yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:10826: 07,137.007a asaṃbhrāntaś ca samare sātyakiḥ kurupuṃgavam 07,137.007c chādayām āsa bāṇaughaiḥ samantād bharatarṣabha 07,137.008a somadattas tu taṃ ṣaṣṭyā vivyādhorasi mādhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:10827: 07,137.008c sātyakiś cāpi taṃ rājann avidhyat sāyakaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10828: 07,137.008d*1158_01 sātyakiḥ prativivyādha somadattaṃ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ 07,137.009a tāv anyonyaṃ śaraiḥ kṛttau vyarājetāṃ nararṣabhau
GE07mbh_07_u:10829: 07,137.009c supuṣpau puṣpasamaye puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukau 07,137.010a rudhirokṣitasarvāṅgau kuruvṛṣṇiyaśaskarau 07,137.010c parasparam avekṣetāṃ dahantāv iva locanaiḥ 07,137.011a rathamaṇḍalamārgeṣu carantāv arimardanau
GE07mbh_07_u:10830: 07,137.011c ghorarūpau hi tāv āstāṃ vṛṣṭimantāv ivāmbudau
GE07mbh_07_u:10832: 07,137.012c śvāvidhāv iva rājendra vyadṛṣyetāṃ śarakṣatau 07,137.013a suvarṇapuṅkhair iṣubhir ācitau tau vyarocatām 07,137.013c khadyotair āvṛtau rājan prāvṛṣīva vanaspatī 07,137.014a saṃpradīpitasarvāṅgau sāyakais tau mahārathau
GE07mbh_07_u:10833: 07,137.014c adṛśyetāṃ raṇe kruddhāv ulkābhir iva kuñjarau
GE07mbh_07_u:10834: 07,137.015a tato yudhi mahārāja somadatto mahārathaḥ 07,137.015c ardhacandreṇa ciccheda mādhavasya mahad dhanuḥ 07,137.016a athainaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā sāyakānāṃ samārpayat
GE07mbh_07_u:10835: 07,137.016c tvaramāṇas tvarākāle punaś ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10836: 07,137.017a athānyad dhanur ādāya sātyakir vegavattaram 07,137.017c pañcabhiḥ sāyakais tūrṇaṃ somadattam avidhyata 07,137.018a tato 'pareṇa bhallena dhvajaṃ ciccheda kāñcanam
GE07mbh_07_u:10837: 07,137.018c bāhlīkasya raṇe rājan sātyakiḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:10838: 07,137.019a somadattas tv asaṃbhrānto dṛṣṭvā ketuṃ nipātitam
GE07mbh_07_u:10841: 07,137.020c dhanuś ciccheda samare kṣurapreṇa śitena ha
GE07mbh_07_u:10843: 07,137.021c ācinod bahudhā rājan bhagnadaṃṣṭram iva dvipam

GE07mbh_07_u:11170: 07,142.020a virāṭaṃ sahasenaṃ tu droṇārthe drutam āgatam

GE07mbh_07_u:11176: 07,142.025a hatāśvāt tu rathāt tūrṇam avaplutya mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11177: 07,142.025c tasthau visphārayaṃś cāpaṃ vimuñcaṃś ca śitāñ śarān
GE07mbh_07_u:11178: 07,142.026a śatānīkas tato dṛṣṭvā bhrātaraṃ hatavāhanam 07,142.026c rathenābhyapatat tūrṇaṃ sarvalokasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11180: 07,142.027c viśikhair bahubhir viddhvā tato ninye yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_07_u:11181: 07,142.028a tasmiṃs tu nihate vīre virāṭo rathasattamaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:11183: 07,142.029a tato visphārya nayane krodhād dviguṇavikramaḥ 07,142.029c madrarājarathaṃ tūrṇaṃ chādayām āsa patribhiḥ 07,142.030a tato madrādhipaḥ kruddhaḥ śatena nataparvaṇām 07,142.030c ājaghānorasi dṛḍhaṃ virāṭaṃ vāhinīpatim

GE07mbh_07_u:11197: 07,142.038a atitīvram abhūd yuddhaṃ nararākṣasayor mṛdhe 07,142.038b*1179_01 gṛdhrakākabalolūkakaṅkagomāyuharṣaṇam

GE07mbh_07_u:11200: 07,142.038d*1180_03 tatrāsīt suciraṃ kālaṃ yuddhaṃ samam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:11201: 07,142.038d*1180_04 tataḥ pārtho maheṣvāso divyaṃ viṣphārayan dhanuḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:11203: 07,142.040a sārathiṃ ca tribhir bāṇais tribhir eva triveṇukam

GE07mbh_07_u:11211: 07,143.001 saṃjaya uvāca 07,143.001a śatānīkaṃ śarais tūrṇaṃ nirdahantaṃ camūṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:11212: 07,143.001c citrasenas tava suto vārayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:11213: 07,143.002a nākuliś citrasenaṃ tu nārācenārdayad bhṛśam 07,143.002c sa ca taṃ prativivyādha daśabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:11216: 07,143.006a tato 'sya niśitair bāṇair dhvajaṃ ciccheda nākuliḥ 07,143.006c dhanuś caiva mahārāja yatamānasya saṃyuge 07,143.007a sa chinnadhanvā samare vivarmā ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11218: 07,143.008a tatas tūrṇaṃ citraseno nākuliṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11219: 07,143.008c vivyādha samare kruddho bharatānāṃ mahārathaḥ 07,143.009a śatānīko 'tha saṃkruddhaś citrasenasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:11220: 07,143.009c jaghāna caturo vāhān sārathiṃ ca narottamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11221: 07,143.010a avaplutya rathāt tasmāc citraseno mahārathaḥ 07,143.010c nākuliṃ pañcaviṃśatyā śarāṇām ārdayad balī 07,143.011a tasya tat kurvataḥ karma nakulasya suto raṇe

GE07mbh_07_u:11225: 07,143.015a vṛṣasenas tu saṃkruddho yajñasenaṃ rathe sthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:11226: 07,143.015c bahubhiḥ sāyakais tīkṣṇair ājaghāna stanāntare 07,143.016a tāv ubhau śaranunnāṅgau śarakaṇṭakinau raṇe 07,143.016c vyabhrājetāṃ mahārāja śvāvidhau śalalair iva 07,143.017a rukmapuṅkhair ajihmāgraiḥ śaraiś chinnatanucchadau

GE07mbh_07_u:11236: 07,143.020d*1182_05 kārmuke yojayitvā taṃ drupadaṃ saṃnirīkṣya ca

GE07mbh_07_u:11252: 07,143.029c duḥśāsanas tava sutaḥ pratyudgacchan mahārathaḥ 07,143.030a tayoḥ samāgamo rājaṃś citrarūpo babhūva ha

GE07mbh_07_u:11264: 07,143.038a kṣurapreṇa dhanus tasya ciccheda kṛtahastavat 07,143.038c athainaṃ daśabhir bhallaiś chinnadhanvānam ārdayat 07,143.039a taṃ dṛṣṭvā virathaṃ tatra bhrātaro 'sya mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11265: 07,143.039c anvavartanta vegena mahatyā senayā saha 07,143.040a āplutaḥ sa tato yānaṃ sutasomasya

GE07mbh_07_u:11268: 07,143.041c abhyavartanta saṃgrāme mahatyā senayā vṛtāḥ 07,143.042a tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tava teṣāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:11270: 07,144.001 saṃjaya uvāca 07,144.001a nakulaṃ rabhasaṃ yuddhe nighnantaṃ vāhinīṃ tava

GE07mbh_07_u:11277: 07,144.006c karṇinaikena vivyādha hṛdaye niśitena ha 07,144.007a nakulas tu bhṛśaṃ viddhaḥ syālena tava dhanvinā
GE07mbh_07_u:11278: 07,144.007c niṣasāda rathopasthe kaśmalaṃ cainam āviśat 07,144.008a atyantavairiṇaṃ dṛptaṃ dṛṣṭvā śatruṃ tathāgatam 07,144.008c nanāda śakunī rājaṃs tapānte jalado yathā

GE07mbh_07_u:11424: 07,145.068c dhṛṣṭadyumnena śūreṇa pāñcālaiś ca mahātmanaḥ 07,146.001 saṃjaya uvāca 07,146.001a tatas te prādravan sarve tvaritā yuddhadurmadāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11426: 07,146.002a te rathaiḥ kalpitai rājan hemarūpyavibhūṣitaiḥ 07,146.002c sādibhiś ca gajaiś caiva parivavruḥ sma sātvatam
GE07mbh_07_u:11427: 07,146.003a athainaṃ koṣṭhakīkṛtya sarvatas te mahārathāḥ 07,146.003c siṃhanādāṃs tadā cakrus tarjayantaḥ sma sātyakim
GE07mbh_07_u:11430: 07,146.005a tān dṛṣṭvā patatas tūrṇaṃ śaineyaḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_07_u:11431: 07,146.005c pratyagṛhṇān mahābāhuḥ pramuñcan viśikhān bahūn 07,146.006a tatra vīro maheṣvāsaḥ sātyakir yuddhadurmadaḥ 07,146.006c nicakarta śirāṃsy ugraiḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ 07,146.007a hastihastān hayagrīvān bāhūn api ca sāyudhān
GE07mbh_07_u:11432: 07,146.007c kṣurapraiḥ pātayām āsa tāvakānāṃ sa mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11433: 07,146.008a patitaiś cāmaraiś caiva śvetacchatraiś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:11434: 07,146.008c babhūva dharaṇī pūrṇā nakṣatrair dyaur iva prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:11435: 07,146.009a teṣāṃ tu yuyudhānena yudhyatāṃ yudhi bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:11436: 07,146.009c babhūva tumulaḥ śabdaḥ pretānām iva krandatām
GE07mbh_07_u:11437: 07,146.010a tena śabdena mahatā pūritāsīd vasuṃdharā 07,146.010c rātriḥ samabhavac caiva tīvrarūpā bhayāvahā 07,146.011a dīryamāṇaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā yuyudhānaśarāhatam
GE07mbh_07_u:11438: 07,146.011c śrutvā ca vipulaṃ nādaṃ niśīthe lomaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:11439: 07,146.012a sutas tavābravīd rājan sārathiṃ rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11440: 07,146.012c yatraiṣa śabdas tatrāśvāṃś codayeti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11441: 07,146.013a tena saṃcodyamānas tu tatas tāṃs turagottamān
GE07mbh_07_u:11442: 07,146.013c sūtaḥ saṃcodayām āsa yuyudhānarathaṃ prati 07,146.014a tato duryodhanaḥ kruddho dṛḍhadhanvā jitaklamaḥ 07,146.014c śīghrahastaś citrayodhī yuyudhānam upādravat
GE07mbh_07_u:11445: 07,146.016a duryodhanas tena tathā pūrvam evārditaḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11446: 07,146.016c śaineyaṃ daśabhir bāṇaiḥ pratyavidhyad amarṣitaḥ 07,146.017a tataḥ samabhavad yuddham ākulaṃ bharatarṣabha 07,146.017c pāñcālānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bhāratānāṃ ca dāruṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:11447: 07,146.018a śaineyas tu raṇe kruddhas tava putraṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_07_u:11448: 07,146.018c sāyakānām aśītyā tu vivyādhorasi bhārata 07,146.019a tato 'sya vāhān samare śarair ninye yamakṣayam 07,146.019c sārathiṃ ca rathāt tūrṇaṃ pātayām āsa patriṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:11449: 07,146.020a hatāśve tu rathe tiṣṭhan putras tava viśāṃ pate 07,146.020c mumoca niśitān bāṇāñ śaineyasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:11450: 07,146.021a śarān pañcāśatas tāṃs tu śaineyaḥ kṛtahastavat
GE07mbh_07_u:11451: 07,146.021c ciccheda samare rājan preṣitāṃs tanayena te
GE07mbh_07_u:11452: 07,146.022a athāpareṇa bhallena muṣṭideśe mahad dhanuḥ 07,146.022c ciccheda rabhaso yuddhe tava putrasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:11453: 07,146.023a viratho vidhanuṣkaś ca sarvalokeśvaraḥ prabhuḥ 07,146.023c āruroha rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ bhāsvaraṃ kṛtavarmaṇaḥ 07,146.024a duryodhane parāvṛtte śaineyas tava vāhinīm 07,146.024c drāvayām āsa viśikhair niśāmadhye viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:11454: 07,146.025a śakuniś cārjunaṃ rājan parivārya samantataḥ 07,146.025c rathair anekasāhasrair gajaiś caiva sahasraśaḥ 07,146.025e tathā hayasahasraiś ca tumulaṃ sarvato 'karot
GE07mbh_07_u:11456: 07,146.026c arjunaṃ yodhayanti sma kṣatriyāḥ kālacoditāḥ 07,146.027a tāny arjunaḥ sahasrāṇi
GE07mbh_07_u:11457: 07,146.027c pratyavārayad āyastaḥ prakurvan vipulaṃ kṣayam 07,146.028a tatas tu samare śūraḥ śakuniḥ saubalas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:11458: 07,146.028c vivyādha niśitair bāṇair arjunaṃ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:11459: 07,146.028d*1193_01 tato 'rjunam arighnaṃ taṃ vivyādha yudhi saubalaḥ 07,146.028d*1193_02 roṣatāmrekṣaṇaḥ kruddho viṃśatyā sāyakair bhṛśam 07,146.029a punaś caiva śatenāsya saṃrurodha mahāratham 07,146.029c tam arjunas tu viṃśatyā vivyādha yudhi bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:11460: 07,146.030a athetarān maheṣvāsāṃs tribhis tribhir avidhyata 07,146.030c saṃvārya tān bāṇagaṇair yudhi rājan dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11461: 07,146.030e avadhīt tāvakān yodhān vajrapāṇir ivāsurān 07,146.031a bhujaiś chinnair mahārāja śarīraiś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11462: 07,146.031c samāstīrṇā dharā tatra babhau puṣpair ivācitā
GE07mbh_07_u:11463: 07,146.031d*1194_01 śirobhiḥ sakirīṭaiś ca sunasaiś cārukuṇḍalaiḥ 07,146.031d*1194_02 saṃdaṣṭauṣṭhapuṭaiḥ krodhāt tathaivoddhṛtalocanaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11465: 07,146.031d*1194_04 paṅkajair iva vinyastaiḥ patitair vibabhau mahī
GE07mbh_07_u:11466: 07,146.031d*1194_05 kṛtvā tat karma bībhatsur ugram ugraparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11467: 07,146.032a sa viddhvā śakuniṃ bhūyaḥ pañcabhir nataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11468: 07,146.032c ulūkaṃ tribhir ājaghne tribhir eva mahāyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11469: 07,146.032d*1195_01 sa tu tena samāviddhaḥ krodhād dviguṇavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11471: 07,146.033a tam ulūkas tathā viddhvā vāsudevam atāḍayat
GE07mbh_07_u:11472: 07,146.033c nanāda ca mahānādaṃ pūrayan vasudhātalam 07,146.034a arjunas tu drutaṃ gatvā śakuner dhanur ācchinat
GE07mbh_07_u:11473: 07,146.034c ninye ca caturo vāhān yamasya sadanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:11474: 07,146.035a tato rathād avaplutya saubalo bharatarṣabha 07,146.035c ulūkasya rathaṃ tūrṇam āruroha viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:11475: 07,146.036a tāv ekaratham ārūḍhau pitāputrau mahārathau 07,146.036c pārthaṃ siṣicatur bāṇair giriṃ meghāv ivotthitau
GE07mbh_07_u:11476: 07,146.037a tau tu viddhvā mahārāja pāṇḍavo niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11477: 07,146.037c vidrāvayaṃs tava camūṃ śataśo vyadhamac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11479: 07,146.038c vicchinnāni tathā rājan balāny āsan viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:11480: 07,146.039a tad balaṃ bharataśreṣṭha vadhyamānaṃ tathā niśi
GE07mbh_07_u:11481: 07,146.039c pradudrāva diśaḥ sarvā vīkṣamāṇaṃ bhayārditam 07,146.040a utsṛjya vāhān samare codayantas tathāpare 07,146.040c saṃbhrāntāḥ paryadhāvanta tasmiṃs tamasi dāruṇe 07,146.041a vijitya samare yodhāṃs tāvakān bharatarṣabha 07,146.041c dadhmatur muditau śaṅkhau vāsudevadhanaṃjayau
GE07mbh_07_u:11482: 07,146.042a dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārāja droṇaṃ viddhvā tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11483: 07,146.042c ciccheda dhanuṣas tūrṇaṃ jyāṃ śareṇa śitena ha
GE07mbh_07_u:11484: 07,146.043a tan nidhāya dhanur nīḍe droṇaḥ kṣatriyamardanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11486: 07,146.044a dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ tato droṇo viddhvā saptabhir āśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11487: 07,146.044c sārathiṃ pañcabhir bāṇai rājan vivyādha saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:11488: 07,146.045a taṃ nivārya śarais tūrṇaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11490: 07,146.046a vadhyamāne bale tasmiṃs tava putrasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:11493: 07,146.047c yathā vaitaraṇī rājan yamarāṣṭrapuraṃ prati 07,146.048a drāvayitvā tu tat sainyaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_07_u:11494: 07,146.048c atyarājata tejasvī śakro devagaṇeṣv iva 07,146.049a atha dadhmur mahāśaṅkhān
GE07mbh_07_u:11495: 07,146.049c yamau ca yuyudhānaś ca pāṇḍavaś ca vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11496: 07,146.049d*1196_01 etasminn eva kāle tu sūtaputro mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11497: 07,146.049d*1196_02 cakāra kadanaṃ ghoraṃ pāṇḍusainyeṣu māriṣa 07,146.050a jitvā rathasahasrāṇi tāvakānāṃ mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11499: 07,146.051a paśyatas tava putrasya karṇasya ca madotkaṭāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11500: 07,146.051c tathā droṇasya śūrasya drauṇeś caiva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:11501: 07,147.001 saṃjaya uvāca 07,147.001a vidrutaṃ svabalaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadhyamānaṃ mahātmabhiḥ 07,147.001c krodhena mahatāviṣṭaḥ putras tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:11502: 07,147.002a abhyetya sahasā karṇaṃ droṇaṃ ca jayatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_07_u:11503: 07,147.002c amarṣavaśam āpanno vākyajño vākyam abravīt 07,147.002d*1197_01 tato duryodhano droṇaṃ karṇaṃ ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:11504: 07,147.002d*1197_02 codayām āsa tau tūrṇam amarṣavaśam īyatuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11505: 07,147.003a bhavadbhyām iha saṃgrāmo kruddhābhyāṃ saṃpravartitaḥ 07,147.003c āhave nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā saindhavaṃ savyasācinā 07,147.004a nihanyamānāṃ pāṇḍūnāṃ balena mama vāhinīm 07,147.004c bhūtvā tadvijaye śaktāv aśaktāv iva paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11506: 07,147.005a yady ahaṃ bhavatos tyājyo na vācyo 'smi tadaiva hi 07,147.005c āvāṃ pāṇḍusutān saṃkhye jeṣyāva iti mānadau
GE07mbh_07_u:11507: 07,147.006a tadaivāhaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā bhavadbhyām anusaṃmatam 07,147.006c kṛtavān pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ vairaṃ yodhavināśanam 07,147.007a yadi nāhaṃ parityājyo bhavadbhyāṃ puruṣarṣabhau 07,147.007c yudhyetām anurūpeṇa vikrameṇa suvikramau
GE07mbh_07_u:11508: 07,147.007d*1198_01 prastutaṃ hi mayā yuddham āśritya vipulaṃ balam
GE07mbh_07_u:11509: 07,147.007d*1198_02 bhavadbhyāṃ pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ tac ca sarvaṃ
GE07mbh_07_u:11511: 07,147.008a vākpratodena tau vīrau praṇunnau tanayena te
GE07mbh_07_u:11512: 07,147.008c prāvartayetāṃ tau yuddhaṃ ghaṭṭitāv iva pannagau
GE07mbh_07_u:11513: 07,147.009a tatas tau rathināṃ śreṣṭhau sarvalokadhanurdharau 07,147.009c śaineyapramukhān pārthān abhidudruvatū raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:11514: 07,147.010a tathaiva sahitāḥ pārthāḥ svena sainyena saṃvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11515: 07,147.010c abhyavartanta tau vīrau nardamānau muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11516: 07,147.011a atha droṇo maheṣvāso daśabhiḥ śinipuṃgavam 07,147.011c avidhyat tvaritaṃ kruddhaḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ 07,147.012a karṇaś ca daśabhir bāṇaiḥ putraś ca tava saptabhiḥ 07,147.012c daśabhir vṛṣasenaś ca saubalaś cāpi saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11517: 07,147.012e ete kaurava saṃkrande śaineyaṃ paryavārayan 07,147.012f*1199_01 pāñcālān āgatān droṇaḥ preṣayad yamasādanam 07,147.012f*1199_02 etasminn eva kāle tu sūtaputro mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11518: 07,147.012f*1199_03 karṇo rājan maheṣvāso yuddhāya mahato mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:11519: 07,147.012f*1199_04 manaḥ kṛtvābhyayād āśu dhṛṣṭadyumnarathaṃ prati 07,147.013a dṛṣṭvā ca samare droṇaṃ nighnantaṃ pāṇḍavīṃ camūm
GE07mbh_07_u:11520: 07,147.013c vivyadhuḥ somakās tūrṇaṃ samantāc charavṛṣṭibhiḥ 07,147.014a tato droṇo 'harat prāṇān kṣatriyāṇāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:11521: 07,147.014c raśmibhir bhāskaro rājaṃs tamasām iva bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:11522: 07,147.015a droṇena vadhyamānānāṃ pāñcālānāṃ viśāṃ pate 07,147.015c śuśruve tumulaḥ śabdaḥ krośatām itaretaram 07,147.016a putrān anye pitṝn anye bhrātṝn anye ca mātulān 07,147.016c bhāgineyān vayasyāṃś ca tathā saṃbandhibāndhavān 07,147.016e utsṛjyotsṛjya gacchanti tvaritā jīvitepsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11523: 07,147.017a apare mohitā mohāt tam evābhimukhā yayuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11524: 07,147.017c pāṇḍavānāṃ raṇe yodhāḥ paralokaṃ tathāpare 07,147.018a sā tathā pāṇḍavī senā vadhyamānā mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11525: 07,147.018c niśi saṃprādravad rājann utsṛjyolkāḥ sahasraśaḥ 07,147.019a paśyato bhīmasenasya vijayasyācyutasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:11526: 07,147.019c yamayor dharmaputrasya pārṣatasya ca paśyataḥ 07,147.020a tamasā saṃvṛte loke na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:11527: 07,147.020c kauravāṇāṃ prakāśena dṛśyante tu drutāḥ pare
GE07mbh_07_u:11528: 07,147.021a dravamāṇaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ droṇakarṇau mahārathau
GE07mbh_07_u:11529: 07,147.021c jaghnatuḥ pṛṣṭhato rājan kirantau sāyakān bahūn
GE07mbh_07_u:11533: 07,147.023c pāñcālāṃś caiva sahitau jaghnatuḥ sāyakair bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:11534: 07,147.024a etayoḥ śaravarṣeṇa prabhagnā no mahārathāḥ 07,147.024c vāryamāṇāpi kaunteya pṛtanā nāvatiṣṭhate
GE07mbh_07_u:11535: 07,147.024d*1200_01 tāṃ tu vidravatīṃ dṛṣṭvā ūcatuḥ keśavārjunau
GE07mbh_07_u:11536: 07,147.024d*1200_02 mā vidravata vitrastā bhayaṃ tyajata pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11537: 07,147.025a etāv āvāṃ sarvasainyair vyūḍhaiḥ samyag udāyudhaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11538: 07,147.025c droṇaṃ ca sūtaputraṃ ca prayatāvaḥ prabādhitum
GE07mbh_07_u:11539: 07,147.026a etau hi balinau śūrau kṛtāstrau jitakāśinau
GE07mbh_07_u:11540: 07,147.026c upekṣitau balaṃ kruddhau nāśayetāṃ niśām imām
GE07mbh_07_u:11541: 07,147.026d*1201_01 tayoḥ saṃvadator evaṃ bhīmakarmā mahābalaḥ 07,147.026e eṣa bhīmo 'bhiyāty ugraḥ punar āvartya vāhinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:11542: 07,147.027a vṛkodaraṃ tathāyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra janārdanaḥ 07,147.027c punar evābravīd rājan harṣayann iva pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:11543: 07,147.028a eṣa bhīmo raṇaślāghī vṛtaḥ somakapāṇḍavaiḥ 07,147.028c ruṣito 'bhyeti vegena droṇakarṇau mahābalau
GE07mbh_07_u:11544: 07,147.029a etena sahito yudhya pāñcālaiś ca mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11546: 07,147.030a tatas tau puruṣavyāghrāv ubhau mādhavapāṇḍavau 07,147.030c droṇakarṇau samāsādya dhiṣṭhitau raṇamūrdhani
GE07mbh_07_u:11547: 07,147.031a tatas tat punar āvṛttaṃ yudhiṣṭhirabalaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:11548: 07,147.031c tato droṇaś ca karṇaś ca parān mamṛdatur yudhi 07,147.032a sa saṃprahāras tumulo niśi pratyabhavan mahān
GE07mbh_07_u:11550: 07,147.033a tata utsṛjya pāṇibhyaḥ pradīpāṃs tava vāhinī
GE07mbh_07_u:11551: 07,147.033c yuyudhe pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdham unmattavad ahaḥkṣaye 07,147.034a rajasā tamasā caiva saṃvṛte bhṛśadāruṇe 07,147.034c kevalaṃ nāmagotreṇa prāyudhyanta jayaiṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11552: 07,147.035a aśrūyanta hi nāmāni śrāvyamāṇāni pārthivaiḥ 07,147.035c praharadbhir mahārāja svayaṃvara ivāhave
GE07mbh_07_u:11553: 07,147.036a niḥśabdam āsīt sahasā punaḥ śabdo mahān abhūt
GE07mbh_07_u:11554: 07,147.036c kruddhānāṃ yudhyamānānāṃ jayatāṃ jīyatām api 07,147.037a yatra yatra sma dṛśyante pradīpāḥ kurusattama
GE07mbh_07_u:11555: 07,147.037c tatra tatra sma te śūrā nipatanti pataṃgavat
GE07mbh_07_u:11557: 07,147.038c pāṇḍavānāṃ ca rājendra kauravāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11558: 07,148.001 saṃjaya uvāca 07,148.001a tataḥ karṇo raṇe dṛṣṭvā pārṣataṃ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_07_u:11561: 07,148.002c pañcabhiḥ sāyakair hṛṣṭas tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt

GE07mbh_07_u:11806: 07,150.044c abhāgyasyeva saṃkalpas tan mogham apatad bhuvi

GE07mbh_07_u:12696: 07,162.023c pṛthivyāṃ rājavaṃśānām utthite mahati kṣaye 07,162.024a na tatra karṇaṃ na droṇaṃ nārjunaṃ na yudhiṣṭhiram 07,162.024c na bhīmasenaṃ na yamau na pāñcālyaṃ na sātyakim 07,162.025a na ca duḥśāsanaṃ drauṇiṃ na duryodhanasaubalau

GE07mbh_07_u:12950: 07,164.078d*1307_02 bhāskaraṃ jaladai ruddhaṃ varṣāsv iva viśāṃ pate

GE07mbh_07_u:12958: 07,164.085c hastinām ayutaṃ hatvā jaghānāśvāyutaṃ punaḥ 07,164.086a kṣatriyāṇām abhāvāya dṛṣṭvā droṇam avasthitam 07,164.086c ṛṣayo 'bhyāgamaṃs tūrṇaṃ havyavāhapurogamāḥ 07,164.087a viśvāmitro jamadagnir bhāradvājo 'tha gautamaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:12970: 07,164.093a iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā bhīmasenavacaś ca tat

GE07mbh_07_u:12975: 07,164.095c trayāṇām api lokānām aiśvaryārthe kathaṃ cana

GE07mbh_07_u:12978: 07,164.097a tato niṣpāṇḍavām urvīṃ kariṣyantaṃ yudhāṃ patim

GE07mbh_07_u:12988: 07,164.102a nihato yudhi vikramya tato 'haṃ droṇam abruvam 07,164.102c aśvatthāmā hato brahman nivartasvāhavād iti 07,164.103a nūnaṃ nāśraddadhad vākyam eṣa me puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:12989: 07,164.103c sa tvaṃ govindavākyāni mānayasva jayaiṣiṇaḥ 07,164.104a droṇāya nihataṃ śaṃsa rājañ śāradvatīsutam 07,164.104c tvayokto naiṣa yudhyeta jātu rājan dvijarṣabhaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:12999: 07,164.110a vicetāḥ paramodvigno dhṛṣṭadyumnam avekṣya ca 07,164.110c yoddhuṃ nāśaknuvad rājan yathāpūrvam ariṃdama 07,164.111a taṃ dṛṣṭvā paramodvignaṃ śokopahatacetasam

GE07mbh_07_u:13006: 07,164.116c antakālam iva prāptaṃ menire vīkṣya sainikāḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:13009: 07,164.118a tataḥ sa yatnam ātiṣṭhad ācāryas tasya vāraṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:13010: 07,164.118c na cāsyāstrāṇi rājendra prādurāsan mahātmanaḥ 07,164.119a tasya tv ahāni catvāri kṣapā caikāsyato gatā
GE07mbh_07_u:13011: 07,164.119b*1311_01 tasya tv ahaś ca rātriś ca śarān abhyasato 'gamat

GE07mbh_07_u:13013: 07,164.120a sa śarakṣayam āsādya putraśokena cārditaḥ 07,164.120c vividhānāṃ ca divyānām astrāṇām aprasannatām 07,164.121a utsraṣṭukāmaḥ śastrāṇi vipravākyābhicoditaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:13018: 07,164.124a taṃ śaraṃ śatadhā cāsya droṇaś ciccheda sāyakaiḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:13020: 07,164.125a dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ prahasyānyat punar ādāya kārmukam 07,164.125c śitena cainaṃ bāṇena pratyavidhyat stanāntare 07,164.126a so 'tividdho maheṣvāsaḥ saṃbhrānta iva saṃyuge

GE07mbh_07_u:13029: 07,164.135c vimalaṃ khaḍgam ādatta śatacandraṃ ca bhānumat

GE07mbh_07_u:13043: 07,164.146c yathā rūpaṃ paraṃ viṣṇor hiraṇyakaśipor vadhe

GE07mbh_07_u:13047: 07,164.148a parivṛttaṃ nivṛttaṃ ca khaḍgaṃ carma ca dhārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:13048: 07,164.148c saṃpātaṃ samudīrṇaṃ ca darśayām āsa pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13049: 07,164.148d*1314_01 bhārataṃ kauśikaṃ caiva sātvataṃ caiva śikṣayā

GE07mbh_07_u:13784: 07,170.049a nāgāyutasamaprāṇo hy aham eko nareṣv iha

GE07mbh_07_u:13801: 07,170.056a tasya rūpam abhūd rājan bhīmasenasya saṃyuge

GE07mbh_07_u:13807: 07,170.060a teṣu nikṣiptaśastreṣu vāhanebhyaś cyuteṣu ca 07,170.060b*1406_01 upariṣṭād bhraman yatra yatra yodhān prapaśyati

GE07mbh_07_u:13816: 07,171.002c arjunasya laghutvāc ca saṃvṛtatvāc ca tejasaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:13821: 07,171.005a sa hi bhīmo rathaś cāsya hayāḥ sūtaś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:13823: 07,171.006a yathā dagdhvā jagat kṛtsnaṃ samaye sacarācaram

GE07mbh_07_u:13826: 07,171.007c tathā praviṣṭaṃ tat tejo na prājñāyata kiṃ cana 07,171.007d*1408_01 tad astraṃ bhīmahuṃkārād apayāti punaḥ punaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:13829: 07,171.008a vikīrṇam astraṃ tad dṛṣṭvā tathā bhīmarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:13830: 07,171.008c udīryamāṇaṃ drauṇiṃ ca niṣpratidvaṃdvam āhave 07,171.009a sarvasainyāni pāṇḍūnāṃ nyastaśastrāṇy acetasaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:13833: 07,171.011c vigāhya tau subalinau māyayāviśatāṃ tadā 07,171.012a nyastaśastrau tatas tau tu nādahad astrajo 'nalaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:13836: 07,171.013d*1409_01 pātayām āsatuḥ punar bhīmasenaṃ raṇe balāt
GE07mbh_07_u:13837: 07,171.013d*1409_02 bhīmaṃ nirāyudhaṃ kṛtvā tadā kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayau 07,171.014a apakṛṣyamāṇaḥ kaunteyo nadaty eva mahārathaḥ 07,171.014c vardhate caiva tad ghoraṃ drauṇer astraṃ sudurjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:13838: 07,171.015a tam abravīd vāsudevaḥ kim idaṃ pāṇḍunandana
GE07mbh_07_u:13839: 07,171.015c vāryamāṇo 'pi kaunteya yad yuddhān na nivartase 07,171.016a yadi yuddhena jeyāḥ syur ime kauravanandanāḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:13841: 07,171.017a rathebhyas tv avatīrṇās tu sarva eva sma tāvakāḥ 07,171.017c tasmāt tvam api kaunteya rathāt tūrṇam apākrama

GE07mbh_07_u:13845: 07,171.019c tato nārāyaṇāstraṃ tat praśāntaṃ śatrutāpanam 07,171.020a tasmin praśānte vidhinā tadā tejasi duḥsahe
GE07mbh_07_u:13846: 07,171.020c babhūvur vimalāḥ sarvā diśaḥ pradiśa eva ca

GE07mbh_07_u:13849: 07,171.022a vyapoḍhe ca tato ghore tasmiṃs tejasi bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:13850: 07,171.022c babhau bhīmo niśāpāye dhīmān sūrya ivoditaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13851: 07,171.023a hataśeṣaṃ balaṃ tatra pāṇḍavānām atiṣṭhata 07,171.023c astravyuparamād dhṛṣṭaṃ tava putrajighāṃsayā
GE07mbh_07_u:13852: 07,171.024a vyavasthite bale tasminn astre pratihate tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:13854: 07,171.025a aśvatthāman punaḥ śīghram astram etat prayojaya

GE07mbh_07_u:13869: 07,171.033a dṛṣṭvā pārthāṃś ca saṃgrāme yuddhāya samavasthitān

GE07mbh_07_u:13872: 07,171.036a dhṛṣṭadyumnas tato rājañ jvalantam iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_07_u:13874: 07,171.036b@022_0002 taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā susaṃkruddhaṃ kālānalayamopamam 07,171.036b@022_0003 vimuñcan viśikhāṃs tūrṇaṃ pārṣato 'bhyadravad raṇe

GE07mbh_07_u:13876: 07,171.036b@022_0005 chādayām āsa bāṇaughair dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ samantataḥ 07,171.036b@022_0006 dhṛṣṭadyumno 'pi saṃbhrāntaḥ śareṇānataparvaṇā 07,171.036b@022_0007 pratyavidhyata saṃkruddhaḥ pārṣataṃ prayato balāt 07,171.036b@022_0008 tasya drauṇir dhanuś chittvā sthūṇena paravīrahā

GE07mbh_07_u:13879: 07,171.036b@022_0012 sa tad apy asya saṃkruddhaś ciccheda paramāstravit
GE07mbh_07_u:13880: 07,171.036b@022_0013 taṃ cāpy avākirad bāṇair dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ paraṃtapaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:13883: 07,171.036b@022_0019 dhanur anyat samādāya samare vegavattaram 07,171.036b@022_0020 tato 'vidhyat sutīkṣṇābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ drauṇim āhave

GE07mbh_07_u:13889: 07,171.036b@022_0028 droṇaputraḥ pracikṣepa sātyakis tad dvidhācchinat 07,171.036b@022_0029 sātyakis tu tam ādāya rājaputraṃ śarārditam

GE07mbh_07_u:13891: 07,171.036b@022_0033 evam uktvā śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ sātyakiṃ tūrṇam āvṛṇot
GE07mbh_07_u:13893: 07,171.036b@022_0035 sātyakis tu tataḥ kruddhaḥ śareṇānataparvaṇā 07,171.036b@022_0036 droṇaputraṃ samājaghne sarvasainyasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13894: 07,171.036b@022_0037 tato drauṇir mahārāja bāṇaiḥ saṃchādya sātyakim
GE07mbh_07_u:13896: 07,171.036b@022_0039 tataḥ śaktiṃ mahāghorāṃ hemadaṇḍām ayasmayīm 07,171.036b@022_0040 cikṣepa sātyakis tūrṇaṃ droṇaputrajighāṃsayā
GE07mbh_07_u:13897: 07,171.036b@022_0041 tām āpatantīṃ sahasā śakramuktām ivāśanim 07,171.036b@022_0042 aprāptām eva ciccheda drauṇiḥ saptabhir āśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13898: 07,171.036b@022_0043 tāṃ nikṛttāṃ śarair dṛṣṭvā drauṇinā sāyakair bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:13900: 07,171.036b@022_0045 tad vikṛṣya mahac cāpaṃ sātyakiḥ sātvatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13901: 07,171.036b@022_0046 sāyakair bahubhis tūrṇam aśvatthāmānam ārdayat 07,171.036b@022_0047 tato drauṇiḥ susaṃrabdhaḥ śarajālena mādhavam 07,171.036b@022_0048 chādayām āsa samare sātyakiṃ krodhamūrchitaḥ 07,171.036b@022_0049 tāny asya śarajālāni antarikṣe viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:13902: 07,171.036b@022_0050 aprāptān eva ciccheda yuyudhāno mahārathaḥ 07,171.036b@022_0051 tataḥ pūrṇāyatotsṛṣṭair hemapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13903: 07,171.036b@022_0052 bāṇair vivyādha sudṛḍhaṃ droṇaputram amarṣitaḥ 07,171.036b@022_0053 tathā sa viddhaḥ subhṛśaṃ droṇaputro 'tyamarṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13904: 07,171.036b@022_0054 śaineyaṃ samare kruddhaḥ pradahann iva cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_07_u:13906: 07,171.036b@022_0056 parvataṃ vāridhārābhis tapānte jalado yathā 07,171.036c droṇaputraṃ triṣaṣṭyā tu rājan vivyādha patriṇām
GE07mbh_07_u:13907: 07,171.037a sārathiṃ cāsya viṃśatyā svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ 07,171.037c hayāṃś ca caturo 'vidhyac caturbhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13908: 07,171.038a viddhvā viddhvānadad drauṇiḥ kampayann iva medinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:13909: 07,171.038c ādadat sarvalokasya prāṇān iva mahāraṇe 07,171.039a pārṣatas tu balī rājan kṛtāstraḥ kṛtaniśramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13910: 07,171.039c drauṇim evābhidudrāva kṛtvā mṛtyuṃ nivartanam 07,171.040a tato bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ droṇaputrasya mūrdhani 07,171.040c avāsṛjad ameyātmā pāñcālyo rathināṃ varaḥ 07,171.041a taṃ drauṇiḥ samare kruddhaś chādayām āsa patribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13911: 07,171.041c vivyādha cainaṃ daśabhiḥ pitur vadham anusmaran
GE07mbh_07_u:13912: 07,171.042a dvābhyāṃ ca suvikṛṣṭābhyāṃ kṣurābhyāṃ dhvajakārmuke 07,171.042c chittvā pāñcālarājasya drauṇir anyaiḥ samārdayat 07,171.043a vyaśvasūtarathaṃ cainaṃ drauṇiś cakre mahāhave 07,171.043c tasya cānucarān sarvān kruddhaḥ prācchādayac charaiḥ
